T02D1912:108b-1: shr'i ma h'a su kha s'a dha no pi ka bya khya na /
T02D1912:108b-3: dpal bde ba chen po sgrub pa'i thabs rnam par bshad pa /
T02D1912:108b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1912:108b-5: bde ba chen po rdo rje che //
T02D1912:108b-6: ye shes mtha' yas 'byung gnas la //
T02D1912:108b-7: phyag 'tshal sgrub thabs don rnams ni //
T02D1912:108b-8: bla mas bstan bzhin bdag gis bri //
T02D1912:108b-9: dpal zhes bya ba ni phun sum tshogs pa la bya'o//
T02D1912:108b-10: de yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o //
T02D1912:108b-11: 'jig rten gyi dpal ni lha dang mi'i 'byor pa thams cad dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1912:108b-12: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad la bya'o //
T02D1912:108b-13: de gnyis dang ldan pas dpal ldan zhes bya'o //
T02D1912:108b-14: dpal gyi sgras ni lha mo bzhi la sogs pa la yang bya ste /
T02D1912:108b-15: de rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor pa'i tshul du gnas pas dpal ldan no //
T02D1912:108b-16: rdo rje ni yang dag pa'i ye shes sems dpa'
T02D1912:108b-17: ni de nyid kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems dpa'
T02D1912:108b-18: zhes bya ste / sems can thams cad dang mthun par sku bstan pas sems dpa'o //
T02D1912:109a-0: @109a * // mgon po sangs rgyas kun ngo bo //
T02D1912:109a-1: zhes pa ni thugs rje'i rang bzhin yin pas sems
T02D1912:109a-2: can gyi bsam pa dang mthun par thams cad kyi
T02D1912:109a-3: don mdzad pas mgon po zhes bya /
T02D1912:109a-4: phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yin pas so //
T02D1912:109a-5: zhe sdang rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso ;
T02D1912:109a-6: / zhes pa ni sems can zhe sdang can thams
T02D1912:109a-7: cad 'dul ba'i cha lugs su bstan pas zhe sdang
T02D1912:109a-8: rdo rje'o // rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi mchog tu gyur pa dang //
T02D1912:109a-9: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po yin pas na rgyal ba'i gtso /
T02D1912:109a-10: lha mo zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D1912:109a-11: rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya
T02D1912:109a-12: dang ldan pa rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul
T02D1912:109a-13: du bde ba chen po rtag tu nyams su myong
T02D1912:109a-14: ba la bya'o // dad pas zhes pa ni gus pa dang bcas pas so //
T02D1912:109a-15: bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1912:109a-16: de ltar phyag 'tshal ba'i don ni rgyud thams cad
T02D1912:109a-17: kyi rgyal po gsang ba 'dus pa 'di gang zag
T02D1912:109a-18: blo dman pa rnams kyis rtogs shing go dka' bas
T02D1912:109a-19: de lta bu'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i
T02D1912:109a-20: phyir ro // dpal ni badzra satva /
T02D1912:109a-21: de dang ldan pas dpal ldan no //
T02D1912:109a-22: gsang 'dus ni rgyud kyi mtshan no //
T02D1912:109a-24: rtogs pa ni sems kyis so ;

T02D1912:109a-26: sems can ni khams gsum na gnas pa'o //

T02D1912:109a-30: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o //

T02D1912:109a-36: nges pa ni the tshom med pa'o //
T02D1912:109a-37: da ni 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan pa yin te /
T02D1912:109a-38: rdo rje ni yang dag pa'i don te de la
T02D1912:109a-39: ma nor bar ston cing bde ba chen po'i go
T02D1912:109a-41: mnyes par bya ba yang rnam pa gsum ste phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'o //
T02D1912:109a-42: phyi ni lus dang longs spyod do //
T02D1912:109a-43: nang ni shes rab rnam gsum gyi sgo nas so //
T02D1912:109a-44: gsang ba ni gsang ba'i mchod pas so //
T02D1912:109b-0: de ltar slob dpon mnyes @109b par byas nas dbang
T02D1912:109b-1: rnam gsum thob nas gnang ba ni sgrubs shig ces
T02D1912:109b-3: de nas zhes bya ba ni mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa zin nas so //
T02D1912:109b-4: sgrub pa ni gang yang rung ba'i sgrub pa'i dngos po'o //
T02D1912:109b-5: brtsam par bya ba ni 'jug pa'o //
T02D1912:109b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi don ni sgra las drangs na manda ni snying po'o //
T02D1912:109b-7: la ni aa da na ste len pa'o //

T02D1912:109b-10: de bzhin ni 'dra ba'i don gsang ba ni thun mong ma yin pa dang //
T02D1912:109b-11: rtog ge bas ma yin pa'o //
T02D1912:109b-12: nyid ni ma nor ba dkyil 'khor gyi don dang gnyis su med pa'i don to //

T02D1912:109b-15: zhes pa ni rtog pa med cing gnyis su med pa'i spyod pa'o //
T02D1912:109b-16: the tshom med par dngos grub thob //
T02D1912:109b-17: ces bya ba ni yon tan de lta bu dang
T02D1912:109b-18: ldan pas bsgrubs na yid kyi 'dod pa'i don grub
T02D1912:109b-20: gtso bo ni yi dam gyi lha dang rdo rje slob dpon gnyis so //
T02D1912:109b-21: mi phyed pa ni mi 'gyur ba dang rgyun mi 'chad pa'o //
T02D1912:109b-22: dad pa ni yid ches pa dang gus pa dang chags pa'o //

T02D1912:109b-29: bram bre zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i ngag nyid yin pas na dor ba'i tshig go //
T02D1912:109b-30: dkyil 'khor dag ni dman pa dang //
T02D1912:109b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni gong du
T02D1912:109b-32: bstan pa'i yon tan dang mi ldan par rang bzo
T02D1912:109b-33: dang gzu lums su byas shing bsgrubs na /
T02D1912:109b-34: 'bras bu mi 'thob cing byas pa chud zos pas byar mi rung bar bstan /
T02D1912:109b-35: de lta bas na dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan te /
T02D1912:109b-36: dam tshig ni bsgrub pa'i dam rdzas so //
T02D1912:109b-37: sdom pa ni kha na ma tho ba med par dang du len pa'o //
T02D1912:109b-38: de yang gang yin zhe na /
T02D1912:109b-39: sha la sogs ba bdud rtsi lnga'o //
T02D1912:109b-42: dri chen dang rdo rje chu yang kun gyi'o //

T02D1912:110a-1: pa'i rol pa las byung ba yin pas so //

T02D1912:110a-5: nyin gcig bzhin du ni dus thams cad du'o //
T02D1912:110a-6: sbyang ba ni h'um gis so //
T02D1912:110a-9: dogs pa ni 'grub mi 'grub pa'i the tshom mo //
T02D1912:110a-10: med pa ni spangs pa'i sems so //

T02D1912:110a-13: gshegs pa'o // de yang gang zhe na thabs dang

T02D1912:110a-17: mnyes pa ni dgyes pa'i don to //

T02D1912:110a-27: su med par song bas bdud rtsir gyur pa ni
T02D1912:110a-28: rtogs pa'o // de'i steng du aom bsgom zhing 'phro 'du bya ba ni ma 'bar gyi bar du'o //
T02D1912:110a-29: de ltar byas shing spyad na sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob pas dam tshig dam pa'o //

T02D1912:110b-0: mchog ni thun mong @110b ma yin pas mchog go //

T02D1912:112a-1: sogs pa'i tshul du bsgom zhing spyad pa'i don to //
T02D1912:112a-2: de ltar spyad pa'i yon tan bstan pa /
T02D1912:112a-3: lus dang ngag yid bder gnas na //
T02D1912:112a-5: slong ba'i zas spang zhing 'dod pa thams cad spyad
T02D1912:112a-6: pas lus ngag yid gsum las su rung ba'i don
T02D1912:112a-7: to // byang chub dam pa ni nyan thos dang
T02D1912:112a-8: rang sangs rgyas las 'phags pa bla na med pa'i
T02D1912:112a-9: byang chub chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin 'thob pa'i don
T02D1912:112a-10: to // to // gsang sngags tshul bzhin du spyad
T02D1912:112a-11: pa'i skyon bstan pa gzhan du bya ba ni gong
T02D1912:112a-12: du spyod pa spangs nas tshul dang mi ldan pa'i
T02D1912:112a-13: sgo nas gsang sngags bzlas na dus min 'chi ba
T02D1912:112a-14: zhes bya ste tshe'i mthar ma thug bar glo bur
T02D1912:112a-16: dmyal ba rnams su rtag tu bsreg / cas pa
T02D1912:112a-17: ni shi nas kyang dmyal bar rim pa rim par
T02D1912:112a-18: 'gro zhing dus thams cad du bsreg par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1912:112a-19: skyon yod pas byar mi rung bar bstan to //
T02D1912:112a-20: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa la sogs
T02D1912:112a-21: pas ni gsang sngags ma h'a yo ga'i sgor zhugs
T02D1912:112a-22: pa'i rnal 'byor pas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mi
T02D1912:112a-23: bsten du mi rung bar bstan to //
T02D1912:112a-24: sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bsten zhing /
T02D1912:112a-25: sngags kyi spyod pa mchog 'di spyad pas 'grub pa yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:112a-26: chos kyi yi ge ni yi ge thams cad kyi mchog yi ge aa'o //
T02D1912:112a-27: 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni don 'thob pa'o //
T02D1912:112a-28: de lta bas na da ltar gyi rnal 'byor pas
T02D1912:112a-29: kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga spyod cing bsgrub par
T02D1912:112a-31: chags pa ni dang po 'am 'dod pa la bya /
T02D1912:112a-32: ye shes ni sku gsung thugs ma yi dam gyi lha /
T02D1912:112a-33: rtag ces pa ni dus thams cad dam rgyun mi 'chad pa la bya /
T02D1912:112a-34: bsgrub ces bya ba ni bsgom pa'am mngon sum du
T02D1912:112a-35: byed pa bya bas ni de 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1912:112a-36: pa gzugs la sogs pa'i yon tan lnga la spyad
T02D1912:112a-38: de yang bsam pa ji lta bu byed ce na /
T02D1912:112a-39: ye shes sems dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i tshul du'o //
T02D1912:112a-40: de la byang chub ni chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D1912:112a-41: dpa' bo zhes pa ni gzugs kyi sku ston cing
T02D1912:112a-42: sems can gyi don byed pa'i dpal rdo rje sems
T02D1912:112b-0: dpa'o // yang na byang chub ni badzra satva la sogs pa @112b dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas so //
T02D1912:112b-1: dpa' bo sgra las drangs na nyi ma la bya /
T02D1912:112b-2: mdor na ji ltar nyi mas rab rib thams cad
T02D1912:112b-3: sel ba bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyang sems can
T02D1912:112b-4: gyi mi shes pa'i rab rib thams cad thugs rje'i
T02D1912:112b-5: 'od zer gyis sel bar byed pas byang chub nyi
T02D1912:112b-6: ma zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1912:112b-7: gnyis su med pa'i lta ba la goms par byed
T02D1912:112b-8: pas rnal 'byor pas 'di dag la smad par mi
T02D1912:112b-10: gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang gnyi ga ma yin pa rnams so //
T02D1912:112b-11: de bzhin du sgra la sogs pa la yang smad
T02D1912:112b-12: par mi bya ste de ci'i phyir zhe na lha'i
T02D1912:112b-14: rdo rje ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs so //
T02D1912:112b-15: 'chang ba ni de nyid kyi rang bzhin nam 'dzin pa la bya /
T02D1912:112b-16: rgyal zhes pa ni mdzes shing 'bar ba nyon mongs
T02D1912:112b-17: pa med pa byang chub sems rdo rje la bya
T02D1912:112b-18: / de nyid thams cad du yang dag par gnas
T02D1912:112b-19: zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin don
T02D1912:112b-20: dam par de dang gnyis su med pa dang /
T02D1912:112b-21: kun rdzob tu gzugs kyi lha mo la sogs pa'i
T02D1912:112b-22: skur bstan zhing sems can gyi don byed pas so
T02D1912:112b-23: // de lta bas na gzugs la sogs pa rab
T02D1912:112b-24: 'bring tha ma gsum khyad par rnam pa gsum du
T02D1912:112b-25: bsgom zhing rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1912:112b-26: thams cad kyi bdag nyid la mchod par bya'o //
T02D1912:112b-27: de la khyad par rnam pa gsum zhes bya ba
T02D1912:112b-28: ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
T02D1912:112b-29: mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par shes
T02D1912:112b-30: pa dang / sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1912:112b-32: rnam pa ni 'di dag gis zhes pa gong du bstan pa'i mchod pa'i thabs rnams so//
T02D1912:112b-33: dam tshig sdom pa bsrung zhes pa ni de nyid
T02D1912:112b-34: las mi 'da' bar byas na bya ba'i don to
T02D1912:112b-35: // tshe 'di nyid la zhes pa ni phung po 'di nyid ma brjes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:112b-36: 'di dag gis zhes pa gong du bstan pa'i mchod pa'i thabs rnams so //
T02D1912:112b-37: rdo rje gsum nyid ces pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1912:112b-38: pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin
T02D1912:112b-40: rigs gsum gyi rig 'dzin gyi 'bras bu 'thob pa'o //
T02D1912:112b-41: gal te gti mug can zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1912:112b-42: ni gong du bstan pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa dang
T02D1912:112b-43: mi ldan par bdag sngags pa'o zhes pa'i mngon pa'i
T02D1912:112b-44: nga rgyal gyis bsgom pa dang bzlas pa bya ba
T02D1912:113a-1: sngags dang gsang sngags kyi spyod pa smad cing spong ba'i skyon bstan /
T02D1912:113a-2: de la zhes pa ni dam tshig las 'das pa'o //
T02D1912:113a-3: dngos grub mi 'byung ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub phra mo yang mi 'thob pa'i don to //
T02D1912:113a-4: zhing zhes pa ni mi 'thob pa'i steng du gong ma ltar yang 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D1912:113a-5: rims ni zhag gcig pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1912:113a-6: dug ni sbrul la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi dug dang /
T02D1912:113a-7: shing kimpa ka la sogs pa'i rtsva shing gi dug dang lus las byung ba'i dug go //
T02D1912:113a-8: nad ni nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi la sogs pa'o //
T02D1912:113a-9: bgegs ni bgegs kyi rgyal po bi na ya ka la sogs pa'o ;
T02D1912:113a-10: / kyis zhes pa ni de rnams kun gyis bsad nas zhes pa'o //
T02D1912:113a-11: sems can zhes pa ni dam tshig las 'das pa'o //
T02D1912:113a-12: dmyal bar 'gro zhes pa ni dmyal ba chen po brgyad la sogs par skye ba'o //
T02D1912:113a-13: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la
T02D1912:113a-14: sogs pas ni dam tshig las 'das pa de shin
T02D1912:113a-16: byin gyis brlab par mdzad pa ni thugs rje che ba de rnams kyis mi bzlog pa'i don to //
T02D1912:113a-17: me tog la sogs phul yang mi bzhes pa ni
T02D1912:113a-18: dam tshig las nyams pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba
T02D1912:113a-19: ci byas kyang bsod nams chen por mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D1912:113a-20: don to // 'jig rten 'dir yang sdug bsngal zhes
T02D1912:113a-21: bya ba la sogs pa ni mdor na dam tshig
T02D1912:113a-22: nyams pa'i gang zag ni 'jig rten 'di dang pha
T02D1912:113a-23: rol tu shin tu yang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur bas
T02D1912:113a-24: dam tshig las skad cig kyang 'da' bar mi rung
T02D1912:113a-25: don to // bar bstan / 'jig rten 'di zhes pa ni tshe 'di'o //
T02D1912:113a-26: sdug bsngal ba ni bkres skom la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad kyi tshor ba myong ba'o //
T02D1912:113a-27: pha rol ni tshe phyi ma'o //
T02D1912:113a-28: yang zhes pa ni 'di la ma gtogs pa'o //
T02D1912:113a-29: dmyal bar 'gro ba ni gong ma dang mthun no //
T02D1912:113a-30: dam tshig spyod pa ni gong du bstan pa rnams so //
T02D1912:113a-31: nyams pa ni mi bsrung ba'o //
T02D1912:113a-32: gti mug can ni legs nyes kyi don mi go ba'o //
T02D1912:113a-33: 'bras bu mi thob ces pa ni byas pa thams cad 'bras bu med pa'i don to //
T02D1912:113a-34: de ltar dam tshig dang spyod pa rnams la rnal 'byor pa gnas par bstan nas /
T02D1912:113b-0: da ni rang gi lus ngag yid gsum 'phags pa'i sku gsung thugs su sgrubs shig par @113b bstan /
T02D1912:113b-1: sngar smos pa'i sdom pa ni gong du bstan pa rnams so //
T02D1912:113b-2: gnas nas zhes pa ni dang du blangs nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:113b-3: rtag par ni dus thams cad du'o //
T02D1912:113b-4: mi phyed pa ni mi 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1912:113b-5: brtul zhugs zhes pa ni nan tan gyis zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1912:113b-6: lus ngag yid gsum ni rang gi'o //
T02D1912:113b-7: rdo rje zhes pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs so //
T02D1912:113b-8: sgrub pa brtsam par bya ba ni der bsgyur ba'i
T02D1912:113b-9: spyod pa dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par bya
T02D1912:113b-10: ba'i don to // de yang gnas ji lta ba bzhin du brtsam zhe na /
T02D1912:113b-11: nags tshal la sogs pa bstan pa yin no //
T02D1912:113b-12: nags tshal ni shing sna tshogs yod pa'i phyogs so //
T02D1912:113b-13: chen po ni sdug pa'am rgya che ba'i don to //
T02D1912:113b-14: ri bo ni bya rgod spungs pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1912:113b-15: ri sul ni dbang po ri'i brag phug la sogs pa'o //
T02D1912:113b-16: dben pa chen po ni dur khrod dam lha khang
T02D1912:113b-17: stong pa la sogs pa'i gnas dben zhing yid du
T02D1912:113b-19: rnams su zhes pa ni de rnams gang yang rung ba'i don to //
T02D1912:113b-20: dngos grub thob ces pa ni de lta bu'i gnas
T02D1912:113b-21: su bsgrubs na yid kyis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'thob
T02D1912:113b-22: pa'i don to // sems dpa'i skyil krung zhes bya
T02D1912:113b-23: ba la sogs pa ni sgrub pa'i srung mtshams bcad
T02D1912:113b-25: sems dpa'i skyil krung ni phyed skyil lo //
T02D1912:113b-26: de yang g-yon pa bskum zhing g-yas cung zad brkyang ba'i tshul lo //
T02D1912:113b-27: 'jam pa'i bstan ni phyi dang nang dang gsang ba rnams so //
T02D1912:113b-28: phyi ni srin bal la sogs pa la byas la 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba rnams so //
T02D1912:113b-29: nang ni nyi zla padma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1912:113b-30: skabs 'dir nang gi las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1912:113b-31: gsang ba ni yum dang gnyis su med par rdo rje dang padmar ldan pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1912:113b-32: 'dug nas zhes pa ni stan de gsum gyi steng
T02D1912:113b-33: du bdag gong du bstan pa'i tshul du 'dug pa'o
T02D1912:113b-35: zhe sdang rdo rje 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul du bsgom zhes bya ba'i don /
T02D1912:113b-36: gnas nas zhes pa ni ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa'o //
T02D1912:113b-37: gnas ni sgrub pa'i sa phyogs so //
T02D1912:113b-38: srung ba ni bgegs thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par byed pa'o //
T02D1912:114a-0: rnam par bsam pa ni 'og gi @114a * //
T02D1912:114a-2: gzugs chen 'bar ba zhes pa ni bdag zhe sdang
T02D1912:114a-3: rdo rje yab yum du gnas pa'i thugs ka nas
T02D1912:114a-4: h'um las khro bo bcu phyung ba'i cha lugs so
T02D1912:114a-5: // gzugs che ba ni srid pa gsum gyi sems can zil gyis gnon pa'i sku dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1912:114a-6: 'bar ba ni ye shes kyi 'od zer bskal pa'i
T02D1912:114a-7: me bzhin 'bar ba'i sems can gyi nyon mongs pa
T02D1912:114a-9: 'jigs rten pa ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba
T02D1912:114a-10: las 'jigs shing mya ngan las 'das pa'i sar 'bros
T02D1912:114a-11: par byed pa'am sgrub pa po la bar chod byed
T02D1912:114a-12: pa'i bgegs thams cad skrag cing 'bros par byed pa'o
T02D1912:114a-13: // khro bo ni khros pa'i cha lugs shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshul lo //
T02D1912:114a-15: phyung ba ni zhe sdang rdo rje yab yum gnyis su med pa'i thugs ka nas so //
T02D1912:114a-16: de yang ci lta zhe na zhe sdang rdo rje
T02D1912:114a-17: yab yum gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems bde
T02D1912:114a-18: ba chen po'i cha bcur byas te de'i h'um bcur
T02D1912:114a-19: gyur par bsam / de nas ya m'anta ka pradzny'anta
T02D1912:114a-20: ka zhes bya ba la sogs pa ming brjod pa
T02D1912:114a-21: tsam gyis khro bo bcu thugs ka nas phyung zhing
T02D1912:114a-22: so so'i phyogs su ma las bskyed pa'i nyi ma'i
T02D1912:114a-23: dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1912:114a-24: smad rtse mor bsam pa ni khro bo de rnams
T02D1912:114a-25: rked pa man chad zur gsum pa phur bu'i tshul
T02D1912:114a-26: du bya'o // ro stod khro bo lta bu zhes
T02D1912:114a-27: pa ni rked pa yan chod khro bo'i cha lugs
T02D1912:114a-28: zhal gsum phyag drug pa la sogs pa dang ldan
T02D1912:114a-29: par bsgom zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1912:114a-30: phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni shar phyogs la
T02D1912:114a-31: sogs pa'i phyogs bcur nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bcu bskyed
T02D1912:114a-32: nas khro bo de rnams dkyil 'khor dag gi steng
T02D1912:114a-34: rim bzhin zhes pa ni phyogs dang khro bo ma nor ba dang shar phyogs nas bskyed pa'o //
T02D1912:114a-35: de yang shar phyogs su gshin rje gshed do //
T02D1912:114a-36: shar lhor mi g-yo mgon no //
T02D1912:114a-38: lho nub tu 'dod pa'i rgyal po /
T02D1912:114a-40: nub byang du n'i la danda /
T02D1912:114a-41: byang du aa mri ta kunda li /
T02D1912:114a-42: byang shar du ma h'a ba la /
T02D1912:114a-43: 'og tu ka ma la kunda li /
T02D1912:114b-1: / de ltar khro bo rnams bskyed nas yang 'di ltar bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:114b-2: bgegs zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi bar chad byed pa'o //
T02D1912:114b-3: thams cad ni bgegs kyi rigs ji lta bu yang rung ba ma lus pa'i don to //
T02D1912:114b-4: bshig pa ni med par byas pa 'am /
T02D1912:114b-6: gnod mdzes bka' stsal zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T02D1912:114b-7: khro bo gnod mdzes bskyed cing bgegs rnams khug cig
T02D1912:114b-8: par bka' stsal pa dang phur bus thob cig pa'i
T02D1912:114b-9: don to // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas zhes
T02D1912:114b-10: pa ni zhe sdang rdo rje yab yum gyi gnyis
T02D1912:114b-11: su med pa'i byang chub sems las khro bo h'um
T02D1912:114b-12: dkar bskyed nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du
T02D1912:114b-14: dbyar gyi sprin phung lta bu zhes pa ni de'i sku mdog bstan te shin tu yang gnag pa'o //
T02D1912:114b-15: bskal pa'i me dpung zhes pa ni sku'i 'od shin
T02D1912:114b-16: tu 'bar zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i
T02D1912:114b-17: mthu che ba'am bdud dang bgegs thams cad 'od kyis
T02D1912:114b-18: tshig cing thal bar rlog pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i
T02D1912:114b-19: don to // g-yas brkyang ba ni zhabs gnyis stang stabs so //
T02D1912:114b-20: smin mtshams khro gnyer ni dpral ba khro gnyer gsum mam lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1912:114b-21: dmar ba'i spyan ni sems can thams cad la thugs
T02D1912:114b-22: rje'i dbang gis chags pa'i don dang bgegs thams cad
T02D1912:114b-23: 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir spyan shin tu yang dmar
T02D1912:114b-24: bar bstan to // zhal gsum ni sku gsung thugs
T02D1912:114b-25: kyi sgo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa 'am
T02D1912:114b-27: mche ba gtsigs pa ni shin tu yang 'jigs par byed pa'i don to //
T02D1912:114b-28: rnam par bsgyur ba ni ljags so //
T02D1912:114b-29: phyag drug la dang po gnyis h'um gi phyag rgya dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1912:114b-30: de yang g-yon gyi mdzub mo bsdigs pa'i tshul du thugs kyi thad kar gzhag ba'o //
T02D1912:114b-31: g-yas kyi mdzub mo gnam du bsdigs pa'i tshul du bsgreng ba'o //
T02D1912:114b-32: dpa' bo ni 'jig rten gyi lha la sogs pa gang gis kyang mi thub pa'i don to //
T02D1912:114b-33: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa zhes pa ni phyag de gnyis kyis so //
T02D1912:114b-34: g-yas gnyis lcags kyu ral gri ni bar ma lcags kyu ral gri'o //
T02D1912:114b-35: g-yon gyi bar ma dgra sta tha ma zhags pa'o //
T02D1912:115a-0: 'di 'dra gzugs zhes pa ni gong du @115a * //
T02D1912:115a-1: bstan pa'i cha lugs khro bo mdun du gnas par bsgoms nas zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1912:115a-2: rang gis de la bka' stsal pa /
T02D1912:115a-3: zhes pa ni thugs ka nas byung ba'i khro bo
T02D1912:115a-4: h'um ka ra la zhe sdang rdo rje bgegs thams
T02D1912:115a-5: cad khug shig par sngags kyi sgo nas bskul ba'i
T02D1912:115a-6: don no // de yang gang zhe na /
T02D1912:115a-7: aom sumbha zhes pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyi yi ge rnams so //
T02D1912:115a-8: aom ni ye shes lnga'am sku gsung thugs bstan pa 'am /
T02D1912:115a-9: sngags thams cad kyi mgo aom gyis 'dren pas so //
T02D1912:115a-10: de yang ji lta zhe na /
T02D1912:115a-11: sngon lha chen po 'dod chags chen po skyes nas
T02D1912:115a-12: gangs ri'i bu mo au ma dang zla drug gi
T02D1912:115a-13: bar du mtshams ma bye bar 'dod chags spyod pa
T02D1912:115a-14: gzigs nas thugs rjes de gnyis 'dul ba'i don du
T02D1912:115a-15: khro bo chen po'i cha lugs su sprul nas /
T02D1912:115a-16: de gnyis mtshams ma bye bar mnan pa'i tshe 'jig
T02D1912:115a-17: rten pa'i lha rnams bred cing 'dar nas mdzes so
T02D1912:115a-18: mdzes so zhes bstod pas ya mtshan du gyur to
T02D1912:115a-19: // yang rnam pa gcig tu de gnyis mnan nas
T02D1912:115a-20: byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing mdzes par byas pas
T02D1912:115a-21: // so // na zhes pas ni nges pa'i don
T02D1912:115a-22: a'a na ya zhes pa ni bgegs thams cad khyer
T02D1912:115a-24: khro ba'i rgyal po 'di dag gis zhes pa ni
T02D1912:115a-25: sngags de dag gis bskul ma thag tu khro bo
T02D1912:115a-26: gnod mdzes kyis bgegs thams cad bzung nas khro bo
T02D1912:115a-27: rnams kyi 'og tu bcug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1912:115a-28: blo ldan ni cho ga la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor ba'o //
T02D1912:115a-29: sbyor ba yis zhes pa ni 'og tu mnan pa'i
T02D1912:115a-30: bgegs rnams mi lta bar bya ba'i phyir phur bu
T02D1912:115a-31: byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i cho ga byas
T02D1912:115a-32: nas thob shig pa'i don to //
T02D1912:115a-33: rdo rje bdud rtsi rgyal chen po //
T02D1912:115a-34: zhes pa la sogs pa ni phur bu bsgom pa'i thabs so //
T02D1912:115a-35: phur bu thams cad khro bo aa mri ta kund'a
T02D1912:115a-36: li'i rang bzhin du bsgoms pas rdo rje phur bu
T02D1912:115a-38: autpala sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba ni phur bu'i kha dog sngo skyar 'dug pa'i don to //
T02D1912:115a-39: 'bar ba'i phreng ba ni phur bu nyid las dkris pa'i tshul du 'phro ba'o //
T02D1912:115b-0: lte ba man @115b chad zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1912:115b-1: ni gong du bstan pa'i khro bo rnams 'dra bar
T02D1912:115b-3: bgegs kyi tshogs la 'og tu gzigs pa zhes pa
T02D1912:115b-4: ni 'og tu mnan pa'i bgegs rnams la ma 'gul
T02D1912:115b-5: cig ces pa'i brda sdang mig tu blta ba'o //
T02D1912:115b-6: de'i sngags ni phur bu'i sngags 'og nas 'byung ba'o //
T02D1912:115b-7: brjod pa ni lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad dam /
T02D1912:115b-8: nyi shu rtsa gcig gam bdun zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:115b-9: rdo rje phur bu ni de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pa'i phur bu'o //
T02D1912:115b-10: nges pa ni the tshom med par btab na bgegs thams cad gnon par 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D1912:115b-12: aom gha gha zhes pa la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams so //
T02D1912:115b-13: rdo rje tho ba phyag bsnams mchog / ces pa
T02D1912:115b-14: la sogs pa ni phur bu 'debs pa'i tshe rnal
T02D1912:115b-15: 'byor pas h'um mdzad bsgom pa'i don to //
T02D1912:115b-16: de yang h'um gi phyag rgya btang la thob phur
T02D1912:115b-17: bu 'dzin cing tshig kyang h'um h'um zhes brjod cing
T02D1912:115b-19: mig kyang sdang mig tu me stag 'phro ba'i tshul
T02D1912:115b-20: du blta zhing bgegs rnams phur bus btab par bya
T02D1912:115b-21: ba'i don to // phyogs mtshams kun du rdo rje me /
T02D1912:115b-22: zhes pa ni phyogs mtshams su yi ge ram bskyed
T02D1912:115b-23: nas bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar ye shes kyi
T02D1912:115b-24: me bskyed pa'o // rnam par 'phro ba ni phyogs
T02D1912:115b-25: thams cad du 'phro zhing sems can gyi nyon mongs
T02D1912:115b-27: me stag 'bar ba 'phro zhing sdang ba rnams tshig par bsam mo //
T02D1912:115b-29: zhes pa ni bgegs thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas kyi
T02D1912:115b-30: mtshams nas so so'i phyogs su 'bros par 'gyur ba'i
T02D1912:115b-31: don to // phyogs mtshams phur bus btab nas ni gong ma ltar byas nas zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:115b-32: steng 'og yang dag byin gyis brlab //
T02D1912:115b-33: ces pa ni gong ma ltar phur bu gdab pa dang me bskyed pa'o //
T02D1912:115b-34: de ltar gnas srung ba bstan nas dam pa'i don
T02D1912:115b-35: zhes pa la sogs pas gnas sbyang ba'i cho gga
T02D1912:115b-36: bstan te / de yang don dam pa'i ting nge
T02D1912:115b-37: 'dzin gyis sbyang dgos pas na srid pa gsum ma
T02D1912:115b-38: skyes pa rang bzhin med par sgoms shig pa'i don
T02D1912:116a-1: dngos po med par bsgom pa zhes pa la sogs
T02D1912:116a-2: pa ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la
T02D1912:116a-3: sogs par snang ba g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba
T02D1912:116a-4: thams cad ye nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin
T02D1912:116a-5: par ma shes shing ye nas yod pa las med
T02D1912:116a-6: par sgom pa ni sgom pa yang dag pa ma
T02D1912:116a-7: yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:116a-8: de lta bas na don dam pa'i rang bzhin sgom
T02D1912:116a-9: pa'i rnal 'byor pas yod pa dang med pa dang
T02D1912:116a-10: thog ma dang tha ma la sogs pa'i sems kyi
T02D1912:116a-11: bye brag thams cad mi dmigs par nam mkha' ltar
T02D1912:116a-12: bsgom pa'o // dngos po ni gong du bstan pa'i phung po dang khams la sogs pa'o //
T02D1912:116a-13: brtan pa ni sa dang ri rab la sogs pa'i snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T02D1912:116a-14: g-yo ba ni lha dang mi la sogs pa'i bcud kyi 'jig rten no //
T02D1912:116a-15: kun ni ma lus pa'i don to //
T02D1912:116a-16: tshigs bcad 'di yis stong gyur zhes pa ni gong
T02D1912:116a-17: du bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas na
T02D1912:116a-19: nas ni stong par bsams nas bsgrub bya'i sa byin gyis brlab ces pa'i don to //
T02D1912:116a-20: cho ga 'di'i sbyor ba zhes pa ni 'og nas
T02D1912:116a-21: 'byung ba'i byang chub sems rdo rje bsgom pa la
T02D1912:116a-22: sogs pa'o // ye shes sa ni rigs lnga la
T02D1912:116a-23: sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i gnas yin pa'am
T02D1912:116a-24: yum lnga'i rang bzhin yin pas so //
T02D1912:116a-25: byin gyis brlab pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bskyed pa la bya'o //
T02D1912:116a-26: byang chub rdo rje dmigs nas zhes pa ni de
T02D1912:116a-27: ltar stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos
T02D1912:116a-28: por lta ba'i bag chags thams cad byang bar byas
T02D1912:116a-29: pa'i rnal 'byor pas h'um las bdag byang chub sems
T02D1912:116a-30: rdo rje de kun du bzang mo bsgom par bya'o
T02D1912:116a-31: // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug pa'i aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
T02D1912:116a-32: de'i steng du byang chub sems rdo rje dang /
T02D1912:116a-33: kun du bzang mo sku mdog zla ba'i mdog dang
T02D1912:116a-34: 'dra ba zla ba'i 'od dang ldan pa sangs rgyas
T02D1912:116a-35: lngas dbu brgyan pa sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du
T02D1912:116a-36: sbyor ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa phyag rgya gnyis kyis
T02D1912:116a-37: 'gying ba'i tshul du g-yon pas yum la 'khyud pa
T02D1912:116a-38: / g-yas pas rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D1912:116b-0: nam mkha'i khams kun khyab cis @116b pa ni de
T02D1912:116b-1: ltar byang chub sems rdo rje kun du bzang mo
T02D1912:116b-2: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems las yi ge
T02D1912:116b-3: mar gyur la / de'i 'phro 'du byas pa las
T02D1912:116b-4: lha mo m'a ma k'i rgyur bar bsams la 'phro
T02D1912:116b-5: 'du byas pa las sems can gyi don du chu'i
T02D1912:116b-6: rang bzhin du gyur nas nam mkha' dang mnyam par
T02D1912:116b-7: gnas par bsam pa'i don to //
T02D1912:116b-8: nam mkha' rdo rje dbus gnas pa //
T02D1912:116b-9: zhes pa ni gong ma dang 'dra bar gnyis su
T02D1912:116b-10: med pa'i byang chub sems las yi ge lam du
T02D1912:116b-11: gyur la gong ma ltar 'phro 'du byas pa las
T02D1912:116b-12: lha mo lo tsa na sku mdog dkar mo gyur
T02D1912:116b-13: bar bsams la 'phro 'du byas pa las sems can
T02D1912:116b-14: gyi don du sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du gyur
T02D1912:116b-15: par bsam mo // de yang khyon ji tsam zhe na /
T02D1912:116b-16: dpag tshad bye ba zhes bya ste de yang gtsor
T02D1912:116b-17: smos pa yin gyi nam mkha'i khams kun khyab pa
T02D1912:116b-18: 'am / de bas chung ba'am sems kyis gang lcogs dang ngo //
T02D1912:116b-19: dang ba ni shel lta bur 'dug cing 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1912:116b-20: dri ma med pa ni rang bzhin gyis nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T02D1912:116b-21: 'phral gyi yid du mi 'ong ba med pa'o //
T02D1912:116b-22: 'od zer sna lnga ni dkar po la sogs pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'od do //
T02D1912:116b-23: kun du 'khrigs pa ni phyogs thams cad du 'bar zhing rab rib sel ba'i don to //
T02D1912:116b-24: sangs rgyas rdo rje can gyis gnas /
T02D1912:116b-25: zhes pa ni de lta bu de sangs rgyas thams
T02D1912:116b-26: cad kyi bdag nyid byang chub sems rdo rje'i rang
T02D1912:116b-27: bzhin yin pa'am rigs lnga la sogs pa'i lha'i pho
T02D1912:116b-28: brang dkyil 'khor bskyed pa yin pas so //
T02D1912:116b-29: de dbus bh'um ni gnas zhes pa ni gong du
T02D1912:116b-30: bstan pa'i sa gzhi'i dkyil du gzhal yas khang bskyed
T02D1912:116b-31: par bstan / de yang gzhal yas khang gi rang
T02D1912:116b-32: bzhin ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i
T02D1912:116b-33: rang bzhin yin pas de'i snying po yi ge bhr'um
T02D1912:116b-34: las bskyed par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:116b-35: gser gyi ri bo 'dra ba yi ;
T02D1912:116b-36: / zhes pa ni sku ri rab dang 'dra bar
T02D1912:116b-37: shin tu yang che ba dang sku mdog ser ba'o
T02D1912:116b-38: // sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhal med khang ni dus
T02D1912:116b-39: gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhugs
T02D1912:117a-0: 'khor los sgyur ba bsgom par bya ba ni gzhal yas khang gi @117a * //
T02D1912:117a-1: rang bzhin du smon lam gyis gyur pa yin pas so //
T02D1912:117a-2: de yang gong du bstan pa'i yi ge las gtsug
T02D1912:117a-3: tor 'khor los sgyur ba chen po sku mdog gser
T02D1912:117a-4: dang 'dra ba zhal gsum phyag drug pa g-yas gsum
T02D1912:117a-5: 'khor lo dang rdo rje dang rin po che bsnams
T02D1912:117a-6: pa / g-yon gsum na padma dang ral gri dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
T02D1912:117a-8: sku las 'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab pa phyogs
T02D1912:117a-9: bcur 'phro ba lo tsa na dang gnyis su med
T02D1912:117a-10: par sbyor ba'i tshul du gnas par bsgom pa'i don
T02D1912:117a-11: to // las kyi rdo rje bstan zhes pa ni
T02D1912:117a-12: las kyi rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das don yod
T02D1912:117a-13: to // grub pa'o // bstan ni lha mo sgrol ma'o //
T02D1912:117a-14: shes rab ldan pa ni rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1912:117a-15: de zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang dang sa gzhi
T02D1912:117a-16: dang chu'i 'og tu gong du bstan pa'i tshul du
T02D1912:117a-17: yi ge ha las lha mo sgrol ma rlung gi
T02D1912:117a-18: dkyil 'khor dang 'dra ba bsgom zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1912:117a-19: to // de dang 'dra ba'i yi ge bhr'um las
T02D1912:117a-20: lha mo na bza' dkar mo drod thams cad kyi
T02D1912:117a-21: tshul du gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1912:117a-22: gong du rim pa bzhin ma bstan pa ni phyi
T02D1912:117a-23: rol gyi yi ge dang tshig la mkhas pa rnams
T02D1912:117a-24: kyis mi go bar bya ba'i phyir slob dpon gyis
T02D1912:117a-26: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa //
T02D1912:117a-27: zhes pa ni nam mkha' kun du bzang mo'i rang
T02D1912:117a-28: bzhin stong pa nyid la gzhal yas khang de lta
T02D1912:117a-29: bu bskyed pa de bde bar gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1912:117a-30: kyi bzhugs gnas yin pa'i don no //
T02D1912:117a-31: rin chen bzhi dngos zhes pas ni gzhal yas khang gi kha dog bstan to //
T02D1912:117a-32: ye shes bzhi las rin po che bzhir snang ba
T02D1912:117a-33: ste de yang shar phyogs me long lta bu'i ye
T02D1912:117a-34: shes shel lta bur snang ba dang /
T02D1912:117a-35: lho phyogs mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes aindra n'i la ltar snang ba dang /
T02D1912:117a-36: nub phyogs so sor rtog pa'i ye shes padma r'a ga ltar snang ba dang /
T02D1912:117a-37: byang phyogs bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes aindra n'i la margad ljang gu ltar snang ba'o //
T02D1912:117a-38: chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes ni kun la khyab par shes par bya'o //
T02D1912:117a-39: mchod rten zhes pa ni 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod
T02D1912:117a-40: par 'os pa gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'i rang
T02D1912:117a-41: bzhin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:117b-1: zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i 'od zer kha dog
T02D1912:117b-2: lngar 'phro zhing mchod pa'i bye brag tu gyur nas
T02D1912:117b-3: gzhal yas khang de brgyan pa'o //
T02D1912:117b-4: ye shes rgya mtsho zhes pa ni sangs rgyas so //
T02D1912:117b-5: de yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la sogs
T02D1912:117b-6: pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa gting dpag
T02D1912:117b-7: dka' bas so // dus gsum ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar ro //
T02D1912:117b-8: yang na ye shes ni gdod ma nas ma skyes pa chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D1912:117b-9: rgya mtsho ni mtha' thug pa med pa'o //
T02D1912:117b-10: de'i rang bzhin dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas yin pa'i don to //
T02D1912:117b-11: gnas su de ni rnam par bsam //
T02D1912:117b-12: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi bzhugs gnas yin par bsgom mo //
T02D1912:117b-13: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi zhes pa la sogs
T02D1912:117b-14: pas ni gzhal yas khang de'i dbyibs dang rgyan bstan
T02D1912:117b-15: / gru bzhi ye shes bzhi'am yum bzhi las grub pa'i rtags so ;
T02D1912:117b-16: / sgo bzhi ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa bzhi'i rtags so //
T02D1912:117b-17: sgo rgyan bzhi ni byams pa chen po la sogs pa tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi'i rtags so //
T02D1912:117b-18: yang dag ldan zhes pa ni de lta bu'i rang
T02D1912:117b-19: bzhin tva ra na bzhi dang gzhal yas khang dang
T02D1912:117b-21: dril bu ni shes rab kyi sgra sgrogs shing sems
T02D1912:117b-22: can gyi mi shes pa thams cad sel ba'i don
T02D1912:117b-23: to // dar dbyangs ni 'dul ba'i dbang du rigs
T02D1912:117b-24: lnga la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams su
T02D1912:117b-25: kun rdzob kyi sku bstan pa lha dang mi las
T02D1912:117b-26: 'phags shing mtshan dang dpe byad rnams dang ldan pa'i
T02D1912:117b-27: to // rtags so // pan ni sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1912:117b-28: yon tan 'jig rten gyi lha dbang phyug la sogs
T02D1912:117b-29: pa las khyad par du 'phags pa'i don sogs pa'i
T02D1912:117b-30: sgra ni mu tig ha ra dang /
T02D1912:117b-31: rnga yab dang bla re la sogs pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa rnams so //
T02D1912:117b-32: de yang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa dang sbyor ro //
T02D1912:117b-33: sgo khyud kyi sa rnam par brgyan pa ni yid
T02D1912:117b-34: bzhin nor bu rin po che'i sgo khyud rnams dang
T02D1912:117b-35: ldan pa'o // grva mtshams ni thig gnyis kyi bar dang ka ba'i bar ro //
T02D1912:117b-36: thams cad ni lha rnams kyi bzhugs pa'i sa rnams so //
T02D1912:117b-37: rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis brgyan /
T02D1912:118a-0: zhes pa ni de dag tu rdo rje dang @118a * //
T02D1912:118a-1: rin po che tha dad pa rnams ci mdzes su bri'o //
T02D1912:118a-2: zla gam chu'i 'phyang zhes pa la sogs pa'i rgyan
T02D1912:118a-3: 'di dag gis kyang mdzes par byas shing sangs rgyas
T02D1912:118a-4: kyi yon tan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1912:118a-5: thig skud bzhi ni yongs btab pa //
T02D1912:118a-6: zhes pa la sogs pas ni yon tan de lta
T02D1912:118a-7: bu dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang gi dbus su
T02D1912:118a-8: re'u cha dgu'i dkyil 'khor bri ba 'am bsgom par
T02D1912:118a-9: bstan to // thig skud ces pa ni ras bal
T02D1912:118a-10: la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la bu mo
T02D1912:118a-11: mtshan dang ldan pas bkal ba kha dog gsum mam
T02D1912:118a-12: lnga sum sgril lam lnga sgril byas pa'i skud pa
T02D1912:118a-13: byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o
T02D1912:118a-14: bstan to // // bzhi yongs su gtang ba ni
T02D1912:118a-15: de'i dus su rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs su
T02D1912:118a-16: bsgoms la aom a'a: h'um brjod cing shar phyogs nas
T02D1912:118a-17: nub phyogs su thig gnyis btab pa dang /
T02D1912:118a-18: lho phyogs nas byang phyogs su thig gnyis btab pa'o //
T02D1912:118a-19: ka ba mchog brgyad kun du gnas pa ni de
T02D1912:118a-20: ltar btab pas phyogs re rer ka ba gnyis gnyis
T02D1912:118a-21: kyi tshul du gnas pas so //
T02D1912:118a-22: mchog ces pas ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo brgyad kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1912:118a-23: dbus su 'khor lo dmigs bya ba ni thig de'i
T02D1912:118a-24: mtha' kun nas zlum por bskor zhing re'u cha dgu
T02D1912:118a-26: mdor na zhes pa ni phyogs dang sangs rgyas so sor slob dpon gyis ma bstan pa'i don to //
T02D1912:118a-27: sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'o //
T02D1912:118a-28: rang gi gnas su rnam par bsam //
T02D1912:118a-29: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i phyogs
T02D1912:118a-30: su bsgom pa 'am bri zhes pa'i don te de
T02D1912:118a-31: yang dbus su mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1912:118a-32: shar du rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1912:118a-34: nub tu tshe dpag med do //
T02D1912:118a-35: byang du don thams cad grub pa'o //
T02D1912:118a-36: rdo rje lha mo bzhi rnams zhes pa ni sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa bzhi'o //
T02D1912:118a-37: 'khor lo'i grvar ni rnam par bsgom //
T02D1912:118a-38: zhes pa ni me'i phyogs nas dbang ldan gyi phyogs
T02D1912:118a-39: su sangs rgyas spyan la sogs pa bzhi rim pa
T02D1912:118b-0: gshin rje gshed la sogs zhes pa ni gshin rje gshed dang gzhan @118b gyis mi thub pa dang /
T02D1912:118b-1: rta mgrin dang bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o //
T02D1912:118b-2: sgor dmigs ba ni shar sgo nas byang sgor rim pa bzhin du dmigs pa'o //
T02D1912:118b-3: sa'i snying po la sogs pa bsgom //
T02D1912:118b-4: zhes pa ni sa'i snying po la sogs pa byang
T02D1912:118b-5: chub sems dpa' brgyad sems ma brgyad dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1912:118b-6: phyi'i rim pa la 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul du
T02D1912:118b-8: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D1912:118b-9: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su nyi ma'i
T02D1912:118b-10: dkyil 'khor bskyed la de'i steng du sems kyi rdo
T02D1912:118b-11: rje rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D1912:118b-12: cad kyi rang bzhin nam bdag nyid du gyur pa
T02D1912:118b-13: bsgom par bya ba'i don to //
T02D1912:118b-14: zhal gsum phyag drug lta bu zhes pa ni sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin zhal gsum dang /
T02D1912:118b-15: 'gro ba drug gi don byed pa'i phyag drug dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1912:118b-16: phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni 'og nas ston to //
T02D1912:118b-17: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa ni de ltar ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom pa'am //
T02D1912:118b-18: gzugs brnyan du bris pa'i dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1912:118b-19: rang bzhin nam bzhugs gnas yin pas sangs rgyas dkyil
T02D1912:118b-20: 'khor ro // dbus su gnas pa ni rnal 'byor pa de'i dkyil du 'dug pa'o //
T02D1912:118b-22: da ni ting nge 'dzin rnam gsum gyis phyag rgya
T02D1912:118b-23: chen po bskyed cing bsgrub dgos pas de bzhin nyid
T02D1912:118b-25: lus dang ngag yid rdo rje zhes pa la sogs
T02D1912:118b-26: pa ni lus dang ngag yid ni rnal 'byor pa'i'o
T02D1912:118b-27: // rdo rje ni ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin yin pas so //
T02D1912:118b-28: mtshan nyid dam pa'i don nyid de //
T02D1912:118b-29: zhes pa ni bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum don
T02D1912:118b-30: dam pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid du bsgom pa'i
T02D1912:118b-31: don to // tshul bzhin zhes pa ni dngos po
T02D1912:118b-32: med par bsgom pa'i dngos po zhes pa'i tshigs bcad
T02D1912:118b-34: nas zhes pa ni bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum
T02D1912:118b-35: nam mkha' ltar bsgoms nas 'og gi sngags bzla ba'i
T02D1912:118b-36: don to // sngags 'di rab tu brjod pa ni
T02D1912:118b-37: stong pa nyid kyi don yid la byed cing ma
T02D1912:118b-38: nor bar lan gsum brjod pa'o //
T02D1912:119a-0: aom sh'u n+ya t'a ni chos thams cad @119a * //
T02D1912:119a-1: don dam par chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nam mkha' ltar gnas pas stong pa'o //
T02D1912:119a-2: rdo rje ni mi 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D1912:119a-3: a'atma ko& ham zhes pa ni bdag kyang de lta bu'i rang bzhin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:119a-4: nam mkha' bzhin du blta bar bya ba ni gong
T02D1912:119a-5: ma'i don yang nas yang du yid la bya ba'o
T02D1912:119a-6: // nam mkha' brtag tu med pa ltar //
T02D1912:119a-7: zhes pa ni chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra
T02D1912:119a-8: bar brtag tu med pa yin pas bdag kyang rang
T02D1912:119a-9: bzhin med par shes par bya'o //
T02D1912:119a-10: yi ge rnam par bsgom zhes pa ni de ltar
T02D1912:119a-11: de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin stong pa nyid
T02D1912:119a-12: la ci nus su gnas nas /
T02D1912:119a-13: sems can gyi don bya ba'i yid kyis 'og nas 'byung ba'i yi ge gsum bsgom zhes bya'o //
T02D1912:119a-14: bla 'og dbus ni rim bzhin zhes pa ni spyi bo dang /
T02D1912:119a-15: lce dang snying gi thad ka tsam du bsgom pa'o //
T02D1912:119a-16: bdag nyid yi ge gzugs ni stong pa nyid la
T02D1912:119a-17: gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bdag gi lus ngag yid
T02D1912:119a-18: gsum gyi bag chags yi ge 'bru gsum du dmigs
T02D1912:119a-19: par bya'o // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du //
T02D1912:119a-20: zhes pa ni stong pa'i dbus su yi ge gsum
T02D1912:119a-21: po dkar po dmar po mthing nag tu kha dog
T02D1912:119a-22: gsum du bskyed pa'i don to //
T02D1912:119a-23: nyi zla padmar yang dag gnas //
T02D1912:119a-24: zhes pas de rnams kyi gdan bstan te /
T02D1912:119a-25: de yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um ngo //
T02D1912:119a-28: aom ni dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1912:119a-29: a'a: ni gsung gi rang bzhin no //
T02D1912:119a-30: h'um ni thugs kyi rang bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1912:119a-31: dang bzla ba 'dra ba ni yi ge gsum nyon
T02D1912:119a-32: mongs pa'i dri ma med pas so so'i kha dog
T02D1912:119a-33: gsal ba dang zla ba bzhin zhes bya ba'i don
T02D1912:119a-34: to // yi ge gsum ni gong du bstan pa'o //
T02D1912:119a-35: zhu bar brtag ces pa ni lha'i bu zla ba
T02D1912:119a-36: bdud rtsi 'dod pa'i dus su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1912:119a-37: las bdud rtsi zhu zhing thigs par 'bab pa bzhin
T02D1912:119a-38: du yi ge gong ma 'od kyi tshul du zhu
T02D1912:119a-40: de bzhin du bar ma yang 'og ma la thim
T02D1912:119a-41: 'og ma yang zhu zhing 'od kyi tshul du gyur
T02D1912:119b-0: par bsam mo // rgyu drug gnas pa'i @119b sems
T02D1912:119b-1: can ni lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang
T02D1912:119b-2: ngan song gsum du skyes pa rnams so //
T02D1912:119b-3: sangs rgyas kun ni phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs so //
T02D1912:119b-4: bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus zhes pa ni de
T02D1912:119b-5: la gong du bstan pa'i yi ge gsum gyi 'od
T02D1912:119b-6: zer phyogs bcur 'phros shing sangs rgyas kun gyi sku
T02D1912:119b-7: gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dang gnyis su med par
T02D1912:119b-8: gyur pa dang / rgyu drug gi sems can la
T02D1912:119b-9: phog pas sdug bsngal zhi bar byas nas lus ngag
T02D1912:119b-10: yid gsum dang gnyis su med par gyur pa ni
T02D1912:119b-12: kun bsdus ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gsung thugs dang
T02D1912:119b-13: sems can gyi lus ngag yid gsum gcig tu gyur
T02D1912:119b-15: rang bzhin med par mos pa'i zhes pa ni rnal
T02D1912:119b-16: 'byor pa dag chos thams cad stong pa nyid du
T02D1912:119b-17: bsgom zhing / don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa'i sems kyi bag chags la bya /
T02D1912:119b-18: gzhug par bya ba ni der bsdu ba'i don to //
T02D1912:119b-19: dharma dha tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes
T02D1912:119b-20: pa ni de ltar sangs rgyas dang sems can thams
T02D1912:119b-21: cad kyi don dam pa'i rang bzhin bdag la bsdus
T02D1912:119b-22: pas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje bdag yin no
T02D1912:119b-23: bar bsgom pa'o // byang chub sems de kun du
T02D1912:119b-24: dag / ces pa de ltar stong pa nyid bsgoms
T02D1912:119b-25: nas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba byas pas bdag gi sems
T02D1912:119b-26: kyi rgyud nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral nas
T02D1912:119b-27: ye shes kyi 'od zer gyi rang bzhin du gnas
T02D1912:119b-28: bar bsgom pa'o // pas so // dri med zla ba lta bur gnas //
T02D1912:119b-29: zhes pa ni zla ba lta bur 'od gsal zhing
T02D1912:119b-30: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin zla
T02D1912:119b-31: ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ltar gnas pa'i don to
T02D1912:119b-32: // kun bsdus gong bur sbyor ba yis //
T02D1912:119b-33: zhes pa ni gong du bstan pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon yi ge 'bru gsum dang /
T02D1912:119b-35: sems can gyi lus ngag yid gsum gyi rang bzhin
T02D1912:119b-36: rnams gcig tu gyur nas bdag lha gang bsgom pa
T02D1912:119b-37: de'i sa bon gyi yi ger gyur par bsam pa'o
T02D1912:119b-38: // de ltar bsgom pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so //
T02D1912:120a-0: gzugs kyi ngo bor rnam par bsgom pa ni yi ge 'od du 'phros @120a * //
T02D1912:120a-1: shing sems can gyi don thams cad bya ba dang /
T02D1912:120a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos
T02D1912:120a-3: por gyur nas thugs dam gyi rgyud bskul nas slar
T02D1912:120a-4: 'dus pa las phyag mtshan du gyur par bsgom mo
T02D1912:120a-5: // de yang 'phros shing slar 'dus pa las sku phra mor 'gyur ro //
T02D1912:120a-6: de bzhin du sku phra mor spros shing slar 'dus
T02D1912:120a-7: pa las phyag rgya chen por gyur par bsam mo
T02D1912:120a-8: // de ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1912:120a-9: sngags kyi sku ni mthar phyin pa //
T02D1912:120a-10: zhes pa ni de ltar cho ga rnams kyis sku bskyed pas mthar phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1912:120a-11: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag / ces bya
T02D1912:120a-12: ba ni sangs rgyas kun ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1912:120a-13: la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams so //
T02D1912:120a-14: rang bzhin bdag ni 'og nas 'byung ba'i phung po la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i don to //
T02D1912:120a-15: phung po khams su rnam bsams te //
T02D1912:120a-16: skye mched la sogs rnam par brgyan //
T02D1912:120a-17: zhes pa ni de rnams kyi rang bzhin 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshul du lhar byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1912:120a-18: gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin du //
T02D1912:120a-19: rnam par snang mdzad rab tu gnas //
T02D1912:120a-20: zhes pa ni bdag phyag rgyar gyur pa'i gzugs kyi
T02D1912:120a-21: phung po'i rang bzhin la yi ge m'am dam aom
T02D1912:120a-22: bskyed la de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros nas
T02D1912:120a-23: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul phra rab tsam
T02D1912:120a-24: gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku bkug nas yi
T02D1912:120a-25: ge dang gnyis su med par 'gyur zhing rnam par
T02D1912:120a-26: bsam mo // tshor ba dkon mchog dpal zhes pa
T02D1912:120a-27: ni de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po'i rang bzhin
T02D1912:120a-28: la yi ge aa las rin chen 'byung ldan bskyed
T02D1912:120a-29: bsam mo // pa'o // 'du shes snang ba mtha'
T02D1912:120a-30: yas zhes pa ni 'du shes kyi phung po yi
T02D1912:120a-31: ge hr'i: las snang ba mtha' yas bskyed pa'o //
T02D1912:120a-32: 'du byed thams cad gdon mi za ba zhes pa
T02D1912:120a-33: ni 'du byed kyi phung po'i rang bzhin yi ge
T02D1912:120a-34: aa las don yod grub pa bsgom pa'o //
T02D1912:120a-35: rnam par shes su mi bskyod gnas //
T02D1912:120a-36: zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rang
T02D1912:120a-37: bzhin la yi ge h'um las bcom ldan 'das mi
T02D1912:120b-0: mdor na zhes pa ni de rnams bsgom pa'i @120b
T02D1912:120b-1: bye brag gzhan yod na yang zhes pa'i don to
T02D1912:120b-2: // phung po lnga rnams ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T02D1912:120b-3: sangs rgyas lnga ni gong du bstan pa'o //
T02D1912:120b-4: rab tu grags zhes pa ni de ltar bsgom pa
T02D1912:120b-5: 'am gnas par rgyud thams cad kyi nang du bstan
T02D1912:120b-7: aom sva aam ha h'um yi ge 'di rnams las bskyed kyang rung /
T02D1912:120b-8: sa yi khams ni rnam bsam pa //
T02D1912:120b-9: zhes pa ni bdag phyag rgyar gnas pa'i phyi nang
T02D1912:120b-10: gi brtan pa'i rang bzhin las grub pa spyan ni
T02D1912:120b-11: bsam byas nas zhes bya ste sangs rgyas spyan yi
T02D1912:120b-13: gong ma ltar spro bar byas la sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin du gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1912:120b-14: sra ba lta bur byin gyis brlab //
T02D1912:120b-15: ces pa ni gong ma ltar bsgoms pa'i mthus cis kyang mi shigs pa'i lus thob pa'i don to //
T02D1912:120b-16: chu khams m'a ma k'i gong ma bzhin du yi
T02D1912:120b-17: ge m'am las lha mo m'a ma k'i spro bsdu
T02D1912:120b-18: byas nas khu ba dang khrag la sogs pa gsher
T02D1912:120b-19: ba'i rang bzhin du lus ngag sems la khyab par
T02D1912:120b-20: bsgom mo // gang ba nyid brtag ces pa ni
T02D1912:120b-21: khyab pa la yang bya gong ma ltar bsgoms pas
T02D1912:120b-22: yon tan phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba la bya'o
T02D1912:120b-23: bsgom mo // // me'i khams la sogs pa ni
T02D1912:120b-24: yi ge bam las lha mo na bza' dkar mo
T02D1912:120b-26: dro ba'i rang bzhin thams cad la thim par bsam mo //
T02D1912:120b-27: de ni 'bar ba lta bu zhes pa ni de
T02D1912:120b-28: ltar bsgoms pa'i mthus nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg
T02D1912:120b-29: pa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer du 'grub pa'i don
T02D1912:120b-30: to // rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin du zhes
T02D1912:120b-31: pa la sogs pa'i de ni gong ma ltar yi
T02D1912:120b-32: ge t'am las lha mo sgrol ma spro bsdu byas
T02D1912:120b-33: to // nas / g-yo ba'i rang bzhin la khyab cing gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1912:120b-35: de ni rlung lngar 'byung ba ste //
T02D1912:120b-36: zhes pa ni lha mo sgrol ma de rlung lnga'i sgo nas sems can gyi don byed pas so //
T02D1912:120b-37: de yang 'jig rten pa'i rlung dang /
T02D1912:120b-40: phyi nang du rgyu ba'i rlung dang /
T02D1912:120b-41: srog gi dbang po'i tshul du gnas pa'i rlung ngo //
T02D1912:120b-42: de bzhin yid kyi 'gro ba zhes pa ni de
T02D1912:120b-43: ltar bsgoms pas bar snang la 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul
T02D1912:121a-1: khams kyi rang bzhin kun du bzang mo brtag ces
T02D1912:121a-2: pa ni yi ge h'um las kun du bzang mo
T02D1912:121a-3: spro bsdu byas nas nam mkha'i rang bzhin la khyab
T02D1912:121a-5: nam mkha' de yi sbyor bas ni //
T02D1912:121a-6: sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs zhes pa ni de
T02D1912:121a-7: ltar bsgoms pa'i mthus mi snang ba'i dngos grub 'thob
T02D1912:121a-8: pas 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyis mi mthong bas
T02D1912:121a-9: so // sangs rgyas zhes pa ni la dor ba'i tshig go //
T02D1912:121a-10: phung po khams kyi bye brag ni //
T02D1912:121a-11: gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bar gnas //
T02D1912:121a-12: zhes pa ni gzugs kyi phung po lnga dang /
T02D1912:121a-13: sa la sogs pa'i phung po lnga bdag gi tha
T02D1912:121a-14: mal pa'i tshul ma yin par lha dang gcig tu
T02D1912:121a-15: gyur pas gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bar nas zhes
T02D1912:121a-16: bya // de ltar zhes pa gong du de ltar ro //
T02D1912:121a-17: mkhas nyid ni sngags kyi bye brag la mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02D1912:121a-18: bsam byas na zhes pa ni bshad pa bzhin du bsgom pa'i don to //
T02D1912:121a-19: de nyid kun du tshim par 'gyur //
T02D1912:121a-20: zhes pa ni de ltar phung po dang khams lha
T02D1912:121a-21: dang lha mo'i rang bzhin du shes pas bsgom pa'i
T02D1912:121a-23: lha thams cad dgyes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dngos
T02D1912:121a-24: grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyi mchog
T02D1912:121a-26: 'di rnams kyis kyang bskyed pa'i dus su bskul bar bya'o //
T02D1912:121a-27: de la mo ha zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad /
T02D1912:121a-28: ra ti ni lha mo lo tsa nas gnyis su
T02D1912:121a-29: med pa'i sbyor ba'i mchod pas dgyes par byed pa'am
T02D1912:121a-30: / yang na sems can gti mug gis ldongs pa
T02D1912:121a-31: rnams ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis sel cing dag
T02D1912:121a-32: par byed pas gti mug dga' ba ma'o //
T02D1912:121a-33: dve sha ni bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1912:121a-34: ra ti ni gong ma dang 'dra bar dgyes par
T02D1912:121a-35: byed pa 'am yang na sems can zhe sdang can
T02D1912:121a-36: gyi zhe sdang spang bar byed cing yang dag pa'i
T02D1912:121a-37: don bstan nas dga' bar byed pas zhe sdang dga'
T02D1912:121a-38: ba ma'o // r'a ga ni bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D1912:121a-39: ra ti ni gong ma dang 'dra bar dgyes par
T02D1912:121a-40: byed pa 'am yang na 'dod chags che ba'i sems
T02D1912:121a-41: can rnams 'dod chags kyi tshul du dag par byed
T02D1912:121b-0: cing thar pa'i lam ston cing dga' bar byed @121b
T02D1912:121b-1: pas 'dod chags dga' bar byed pas 'dod chags dga'
T02D1912:121b-2: ba ma'o // badzra ni bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'o //
T02D1912:121b-3: ra ti ni gong ma dang 'dra bar dgyes par
T02D1912:121b-4: byed pa 'am yang na sems can lta ba log
T02D1912:121b-5: par spyod pa ngan pas spyod pa rnams la rdo
T02D1912:121b-6: rje'i lam ston cing dga' par byed pas rdo rje
T02D1912:121b-7: dga' ba ma'o // mig dang rna ba sna dang lce //
T02D1912:121b-8: zhes pa la sogs pas ni sa'i snying po la
T02D1912:121b-9: sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' drug mig la sogs
T02D1912:121b-10: pa'i dbang po drug la gong ma'i tshul du bsgom
T02D1912:121b-12: de yang thlhim de yang las sa'i snying po'o //
T02D1912:121b-13: aom las phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02D1912:121b-14: aom gnyis pa las nam mkha'i snying po'o //
T02D1912:121b-15: aom gsum pa las spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1912:121b-16: ha las sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
T02D1912:121b-17: aom tha ma las kun du bzang po'o //
T02D1912:121b-18: nang gi skye mched rnams su ni //
T02D1912:121b-19: sa yi snying po la sogs gnas //
T02D1912:121b-20: zhes pa ni de ltar bsgoms pas mig la sogs
T02D1912:121b-21: pa'i skye mched kyi rang bzhin dang sa'i snying po
T02D1912:121b-22: la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rang bzhin gnyis
T02D1912:121b-24: phyi yi skye mched rang bzhin du //
T02D1912:121b-25: gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas //
T02D1912:121b-26: zhes pa ni dbang po drug gi yul gzugs la
T02D1912:121b-27: sogs pa drug la gzugs kyi lha mo la sogs
T02D1912:121b-28: pa drug bsgom zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:121b-29: de yang gzugs kyi skye mched la yi ge dza'i
T02D1912:121b-30: bskyed nas 'phro 'du byas pa las rdo rje gzugs
T02D1912:121b-31: kyi lha mor gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1912:121b-32: de bzhin du sgra'i skye mched la h'um las rdo rje sgra'i lha mor bsam mo //
T02D1912:121b-33: dri'i skye mched la yi ge bam las rdo rje dri'i lha mo'o //
T02D1912:121b-34: ro'i skye mched la yi ge ho las rdo rje ro'i lha mor bsam mo //
T02D1912:121b-35: reg bya'i skye mched la yi ge kham las rdo rje reg bya'i lha mo'o //
T02D1912:121b-36: chos kyi skye mched la yi ge ram las chos
T02D1912:121b-37: kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje ma bskyed par bya zhes
T02D1912:121b-38: pa'i don to // sa'i snying la sogs sngags rnams ni //
T02D1912:121b-39: rdo rje can gyi rgyud las gsungs //
T02D1912:121b-40: zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa' drug gi bskyed
T02D1912:121b-41: pa'i sa bon yin 'bru rnams ston pas rgyud las
T02D1912:121b-42: bstan pas slob dpon gyis 'dri yang bris zhes pa'i
T02D1912:121b-43: don to // 'di dag sngags ni ma gsungs phyir //
T02D1912:122a-1: la sogs pa ma bris zhes pa ni gzugs kyi

T02D1912:134b-5: rin chen chen po slar gshegs nas //
T02D1912:134b-6: thams cad dbang bskur phun sum tshogs //
T02D1912:134b-7: zhes pa la sogs pa ni /
T02D1912:134b-8: bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyis sems can
T02D1912:134b-9: thams cad snod dang mthun pa'i sgo nas chos ston
T02D1912:134b-10: cing / sku gsung thugs la sogs pa'i dbang bskur
T02D1912:134b-11: bas phun sum tshogs pa byas ma thag tu slar
T02D1912:134b-12: byon nas rin po che zur brgyad pa'i gdan la
T02D1912:134b-13: zhe sdang rdo rje'i g-yas phyogs su bzhugs par bsgom
T02D1912:134b-14: mo zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1912:134b-15: a'a ro lika ces pa'i sngags 'dis padma'i rigs kyi bcom ldan 'das bskul zhing bskyed par bstan to //
T02D1912:134b-16: de la bcom ldan 'das de 'dod chags spyod pa'i
T02D1912:134b-17: sgo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pas 'gro ba
T02D1912:134b-18: 'dod chags spyod pa'i rang bzhin thams cad la khyab
T02D1912:134b-20: yang na yul dang dus thams cad du gnyis su
T02D1912:134b-21: med par brtson pa'i rang bzhin la gnas zhes pa'o
T02D1912:134b-22: // sa bon las ni grub pa yi //
T02D1912:134b-23: rdo rje snang ba mtha' yas bskyed //
T02D1912:134b-24: ces bya ba ni gnyis su med pa'i byang chub
T02D1912:134b-25: sems las yi ge a'am dmar por dmigs la de
T02D1912:134b-26: 'du byas pa las bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha'
T02D1912:134b-27: yas kyi skur gyur par bsgom pa'o //
T02D1912:134b-28: padma r'a ga'i mdog 'dra ba ni sku mdog rin
T02D1912:134b-29: po che padma r'a ga bzhin du shin tu dmar
T02D1912:134b-30: ba'o // mi 'khrugs pas ni cod pan brgyan //
T02D1912:134b-31: zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ;
T02D1912:134b-32: / zhes pa ni gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1912:134b-33: dmar dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal ni zhal dbus
T02D1912:134b-34: ma sku dang mthun par dmar la g-yas gnag cing
T02D1912:134b-35: g-yon dkar ba'o // thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1912:134b-36: phyag drug pa ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1912:134b-37: zhes pa yang gong ma bzhin no//
T02D1912:134b-39: dril bu dkur brten phat phyir te //
T02D1912:134b-40: zhes phyag g-yon gyi dang po la me tog padma
T02D1912:134b-41: 'dzin la de'i yu ba'i thad kar dril bu yang
T02D1912:134b-42: 'dzin cing 'gying ba'i tshul du dku la brten pa'o
T02D1912:134b-43: // g-yas pas padma skyod mdzad cing //
T02D1912:135a-1: pa ni sems can thams cad ma rig pa'i gnyid
T02D1912:135a-2: log pa rnams ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis sad
T02D1912:135a-4: sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i 'bras
T02D1912:135a-5: bu thob pa'i sgo yum gyi gsang ba'i padma 'di
T02D1912:135a-6: nyid yin pa'i rtags su thugs kar 'dzin pa'i padma
T02D1912:135a-7: de phyag dang por bsgyur zhing kha 'byed pa'i tshul
T02D1912:135a-8: du mdzad pa'o // g-yas gnyis rdo rje 'khor lo dang //
T02D1912:135a-9: g-yon gnyis rin chen ral gri bsnams //
T02D1912:135a-10: zhes pa ni g-yas kyi bar ma dang tha ma
T02D1912:135a-11: gnyis la rdo rje dang 'khor lo 'dzin pa dang
T02D1912:135a-12: / g-yon pa'i bar ma dang tham la rin po che dang ral gri 'dzin par bsam pa'o //
T02D1912:135a-13: snying ga nas ni byung gyur nas //
T02D1912:135a-14: thams cad phyogs su rnam par gzigs pa yang gong bzhin no //
T02D1912:135a-15: sems can 'dod chags ldan sbyangs te //
T02D1912:135a-17: zhes pa ni padma'i rigs kyi phrin las 'dod chags
T02D1912:135a-18: can gyi don khyad par du mdzad pa yin pas
T02D1912:135a-19: / bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyang 'gro
T02D1912:135a-20: ba drug dang mthun par 'dod chags spyod kyang nyes
T02D1912:135a-21: pas mi gos pa ni dper na me tog padma
T02D1912:135a-22: 'dam du skyes kyang 'dam gyi dri mas mi gos
T02D1912:135a-23: / pa bzhin no // slar gshegs padma'i dbus su ni //
T02D1912:135a-24: rgyab kyi phyogs su nges par bzhugs //
T02D1912:135a-25: zhes pa ni de ltar sems can gyi don mdzad
T02D1912:135a-26: nas slar byon nas zhe sdang rdo rje rgyab phyogs
T02D1912:135a-27: su sna tshogs padma'i gdan la zhugs par bsgom par
T02D1912:135a-28: bya'o // pradzny'a dhrik ces pa'i sngags 'dis las kyi
T02D1912:135a-29: rigs kyi bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa bskul
T02D1912:135a-30: zhing bskyed par bya ba bstan to //
T02D1912:135a-31: de la pradzny'a ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1912:135a-32: sems can gyi don mdzad par dgongs pa'i thugs tha
T02D1912:135a-33: dad pa'o // dhrik ni de'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o //
T02D1912:135a-34: yang na pradzny'a ni sems can rnams las sna tshogs byed par sems pa'i sems so //
T02D1912:135a-35: dhrik ni de'i rang bzhin no ;
T02D1912:135a-36: / yang na sems can thams cad kyi mi shes
T02D1912:135a-37: ba'i bag chags gcod pa ni shes rab yin la
T02D1912:135a-38: de'i rtags su de'i rang bzhin phyag na ral gri
T02D1912:135a-40: sa bon las ni grub pa yis //
T02D1912:135a-41: rdo rje gdon mi za ba bskyed //
T02D1912:135a-42: zhes bya ba ni gong ma bzhin du yi ge
T02D1912:135b-0: ha ljang gu las bcom ldan @135b 'das don yod
T02D1912:135b-2: de la gdon mi ba ni 'jig rten pas las
T02D1912:135b-3: byas pa thams cad la la la 'bras bu yod
T02D1912:135b-4: cing la la 'bras bu med pa bzhin du ma
T02D1912:135b-5: yin zhing phun sum tshogs pa'i don to //
T02D1912:135b-6: ljang gu bee d'urya 'dra ba ni sku mdog bee d'urya ljang gu ltar gsal ba'o //
T02D1912:135b-7: ral pa cod pan rdo rje'i gnas //
T02D1912:135b-8: thams cad rgyan gyis yan lag brgyan //
T02D1912:135b-9: zhes pa yang gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1912:135b-10: ljang dang gnag dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02D1912:135b-11: zhes pa ni zhal gsum du bstan to //
T02D1912:135b-12: de yang dbus ma sku dang mthun zhing g-yas dkar g-yon gnag pa'o //
T02D1912:135b-13: 'od zer sna lnga 'grogs pa 'bar ba ni ye
T02D1912:135b-14: shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'od zer sku las dkrigs pa'i
T02D1912:135b-15: tshul du 'phro zhing nyon mongs pa sreg cing 'bar
T02D1912:135b-16: ba'o // phyag drug rnam par bsgom par bya ba
T02D1912:135b-17: ni de lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa de phyag
T02D1912:135b-18: drug tu bsgom zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1912:135b-19: ral gri rdo rje rgya gram dang //
T02D1912:135b-20: 'khor lo g-yas pa'i phyag tu bsgom pa ni rim pa bzhin du'o //
T02D1912:135b-21: dril bu padma sdong bcas dang //
T02D1912:135b-22: nor bu g-yon pa'i phyag tu bsam pa ni gsum pa'o //
T02D1912:135b-23: de bzhin snying ga nas byung nas //
T02D1912:135b-24: phyogs bcu kun du gzigs mdzad pa yang gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1912:135b-25: brdzun tshig smra pa'i lam gnas pa'i //
T02D1912:135b-26: sems can thams cad kun du spyod //
T02D1912:135b-27: zhes pa ni las kyi rigs kyi phrin las brdzun
T02D1912:135b-28: dang phrag dog che ba rnams kyi don khyad par
T02D1912:135b-29: mdzad do // sna tshogs chen po slar gshegs nas //
T02D1912:135b-30: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D1912:135b-31: phrin las thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gnas nas
T02D1912:135b-32: / sems can thams cad kyi don thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas mdzad pas sna tshogs so //
T02D1912:135b-33: chen po ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don to //
T02D1912:135b-34: gru gsum dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1912:135b-35: rdo rje sems dpa'i byang phyogs su //
T02D1912:135b-36: sems dpa'i skyil mo grung gis bzhugs //
T02D1912:135b-37: zhes pa ni de ltar don mdzad pa de slar
T02D1912:135b-38: byon nas zhe sdang rdo rje'i g-yon phyogs gru gsum
T02D1912:135b-39: gyi dkyil 'khor rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi gdan
T02D1912:135b-40: la sems dpa'i skyil grung gi tshul du bzhugs par
T02D1912:135b-42: zhe sdang gti mug 'dod chags dang //
T02D1912:135b-43: yid bzhin nor bu dam tshig ste //
T02D1912:135b-44: rigs ldar gtogs pa 'di dag gis //
T02D1912:136a-1: rdo rje sems dpa' sems can rnams la zhe sdang
T02D1912:136a-2: la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa lnga yod par mkhyen
T02D1912:136a-3: nas de rnams kyi gnyen por rdo rje la sogs
T02D1912:136a-4: pa'i rigs lngar bstan pa 'di dag bsgoms shing bsgrubs
T02D1912:136a-5: pa ni 'dod pa grol ba sgrub bar mdzad ces
T02D1912:136a-6: pa'am ma thob par 'gyur pa'i don to //
T02D1912:136a-7: de la 'dod pa ni 'jig rten gyi longs spyod
T02D1912:136a-8: du gyur pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs
T02D1912:136a-10: grol ba ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung
T02D1912:136a-11: thugs thob nas bde ba chen po'i ngang du gyur
T02D1912:136a-12: pa'o // de ltar rigs lnga'i de bzhin gshegs pa bskyed cing /
T02D1912:136a-13: dkyil 'khor du bkod ba bstan nas dve sha ra
T02D1912:136a-14: ti zhes pa la sogs pas yum bzhi bskyed cing
T02D1912:136a-16: gsang sngags las ni grub pa yi //
T02D1912:136a-17: rgyal mchog yum chen lha mo bskyed /
T02D1912:136a-18: ces ba ni dve sha ra ti zhes pa'i sngags
T02D1912:136a-19: kyis bskul zhing rang gi sngags yi ge aom las
T02D1912:136a-20: gong du bstan pa'i tshul du lha mo m'a ma
T02D1912:136a-22: de yang gang gi yum zhe na /
T02D1912:136a-24: bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid yin pa dang /
T02D1912:136a-25: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i tshul du gnas pa de'i yum mo //
T02D1912:136a-26: chen mo ni lo tsa na la sogs pa yang
T02D1912:136a-27: de'i yum yin pa dang khyad par du rdo rje
T02D1912:136a-28: rigs kyi yum 'di nyid yin par des pa'i don
T02D1912:136a-29: to // sngo bsangs autpala mdog 'dra ba //
T02D1912:136a-30: zhes pa ni lha mo de'i sku mdog autpala sngon po'i kha dog bzhin du 'dug pa'i don to //
T02D1912:136a-31: yid du 'ong ba mdzes pa'i zhal //
T02D1912:136a-32: zhes pa ni lha mo de bud med kyi cha
T02D1912:136a-33: lugs yin yang nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin
T02D1912:136a-34: pas gtso bo de rnams kyi spyan sngar mdzes shing
T02D1912:136a-36: sems can thams cad kyi yang mig lam du mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba'i don to //
T02D1912:136a-37: gnag dad dmar dang dkar 'dra ba'i //
T02D1912:136a-38: zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1912:136a-39: zhes pa ni kha dog gsum gyi zhal gsum dang ldan pa'i don to //
T02D1912:136a-40: de la dbus sku dang mthun par gnag cing g-yas dmar la g-yon dkar ba'o //
T02D1912:136a-41: mi 'khrugs cod pan gnas byas pa'i //
T02D1912:136a-42: phyag drug pa ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1912:136a-43: nges pa ni lha mo de'i spyi bor bcom ldan
T02D1912:136a-44: 'das byang chub sems rdo rjer dbang bskur ba'i tshul
T02D1912:136b-0: @136b du gnas pa dang phyag drug dang ldan par
T02D1912:136b-1: bskyed par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:136b-3: sngo dmar autpala phyag na bsnams //
T02D1912:136b-5: nor bu ral gri rtag tu 'chang //
T02D1912:136b-6: zhes pa ni rdo rje dang /
T02D1912:136b-8: autpala gsum g-yas kyi phyag gsum la rim pa bzhin du bsam pa dang /
T02D1912:136b-9: dril bu dang rin po che dang /
T02D1912:136b-10: ral gri gsum g-yon phyogs su rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1912:136b-11: de la rgyal mo ni nyon mongs pa dang ru
T02D1912:136b-12: tra rnams tshar gcod pa de dag las rgyal ba
T02D1912:136b-13: dang / dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i yum yin pa'i don to //
T02D1912:136b-14: 'gying ba ni khams gsum na bdag lta bu yon
T02D1912:136b-15: tan dang ldan pa med ces pa'i sgo nas sems
T02D1912:136b-16: can rnams bdag nyid la mos pa bskyed pa'i don
T02D1912:136b-17: dang / gtso bo la sems can gyi don la chags pa bskyed par thugs dam bskul ba'am /
T02D1912:136b-18: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba nyams su blang bar bzhed pa'i don to //
T02D1912:136b-19: snying ga nas ni byung gyur nas //
T02D1912:136b-20: phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs mdzad de //
T02D1912:136b-21: zhes pa ni gong ma rnams dang 'dra ba gsang ba'i thugs ka nas phyung nas /
T02D1912:136b-22: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gya khams kyi sems can gyi
T02D1912:136b-23: don thabs sna tshogs mdzad par dgongs pa'i don to
T02D1912:136b-24: // bgegs chen gyis ni 'jigs rnams la //
T02D1912:136b-25: rtag tu srung ba nyid mdzad de //
T02D1912:136b-26: zhes pa ni sems can gyi don kun bsams pa
T02D1912:136b-27: bzhin du mdzad kyang lha mo nyid kyi khyad par
T02D1912:136b-28: gyi phrin las gza' chen po la sogs pa'i bgegs
T02D1912:136b-29: rnams kyis bzung zhing gdon pa'i sems can rnams kyi
T02D1912:136b-30: bgegs thams cad tshar gcod cing /
T02D1912:136b-31: dus thams cad du srung bar byed pa'i don to //
T02D1912:136b-32: 'bar ba slar yang gshegs nas ni //
T02D1912:136b-33: rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus ma yi //
T02D1912:136b-34: lho yi grvar ni bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D1912:136b-35: rab dgyes rdo rje la yang gzigs //
T02D1912:136b-36: zhes pa ni ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi 'od zer sku las 'bar ba'i lha chod /
T02D1912:136b-37: de ltar sems can gyi don mdzad nas slar byon
T02D1912:136b-38: nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi re'u cha dgu yod
T02D1912:136b-39: pa'i lho nub kyi re'u'i chal bzhugs nas /
T02D1912:136b-40: rang gi gco bo zhe sdang rdo rje la chags
T02D1912:136b-41: pas dgyes pa'i tshul du blta par bsgom pa'i don
T02D1912:137a-2: spyan gyi lha mo bskyed par bya //
T02D1912:137a-3: zhes pa ni mo h'a ra ti zhes pa'i sngags kyis bskul zhing /
T02D1912:137a-4: yi ge lam las lha mo sangs rgyas spyan gong
T02D1912:137a-5: ma'i tshul bzhin du bskyed par bya ba'i don to
T02D1912:137a-6: // ston ga'i zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba'i //
T02D1912:137a-7: sku mdog shin tu dkar ba'o //
T02D1912:137a-8: rnam par snang mdzad spyi bor gnas pa ni lha
T02D1912:137a-9: mo de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D1912:137a-11: yum yin pa'i phyir spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i tshul gzhag pa'i don to //
T02D1912:137a-12: me tog sna tshogs tshang med pas /
T02D1912:137a-13: dbu la thod du rnam par bcings //
T02D1912:137a-14: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad
T02D1912:137a-15: dang ldan pa'i rtags dang 'gro ba rnams kyi yid
T02D1912:137a-16: du 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir me tog tsam pa
T02D1912:137a-17: ka la sogs pa'i thang las skyes pa rnams dang
T02D1912:137a-18: / autpala la sogs pa'i chu las skyes pa rnams
T02D1912:137a-19: spel zhing phreng ba byas pas dbu la rgyan gyi
T02D1912:137a-21: dkar dang gnag dang dmar chen po //
T02D1912:137a-22: zhal gsum pa ni rab tu 'bar //
T02D1912:137a-23: zhes pa ni zhal gsum gyi kha dog ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang mthun no //
T02D1912:137a-25: cha lugs rgyan dang ldan pa ste //
T02D1912:137a-26: de ni sku mdog la sogs pa'i cha lugs dbu
T02D1912:137a-27: rgyan la sogs ba'i rgyan rnams kyis shin tu yang
T02D1912:137a-29: 'od zer dkar pos kun du 'khrigs pa ni sku
T02D1912:137a-30: dang mthun pa'i 'od zer 'byung bas kun nas dkyil
T02D1912:137a-32: rgyan rnams kun dang ldan pa yi //
T02D1912:137a-33: phyag drug pa ni rnam par bsam //
T02D1912:137a-34: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i rgyan dang ldan pa
T02D1912:137a-35: de phyag drug dang ldan par bskyed pa'i don to
T02D1912:137a-37: autpala dkar po phyag na bsnams //
T02D1912:137a-38: rin chen sdong bu yid 'ong dang //
T02D1912:137a-39: dril bu ral gri g-yon par mtshon //
T02D1912:137a-40: zhes bya ba ni phyag drug la phyag mtshan de drug rim pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D1912:137a-41: de bzhin snying ga nas byung nas //
T02D1912:137a-42: phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par gzigs pa yang gong ma bzhin no //
T02D1912:137a-43: gdon nad na ba'i sems can rnams //
T02D1912:137a-44: zhi ba'i gnas kyis zhi bar mdzad //
T02D1912:137a-45: ces pa ni lha mo lo tsa na'i khyad par gyi phrin las zhi ba yin pas /
T02D1912:137b-0: gdon nad @137b kyis zin nas na ba'i sems can
T02D1912:137b-1: rnams kyi sdug bsngal zhi ba'i sgo nas zhi bar
T02D1912:137b-2: mdzad cing phan 'dogs pa'i don to //
T02D1912:137b-3: snang mdzad de ni slar gshegs nas //
T02D1912:137b-4: dang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D1912:137b-5: shar gyi grvar ni bzhugs nas kyang //
T02D1912:137b-6: rdo rje mgon ni gzigs par mdzad //
T02D1912:137b-7: ces pa ni de ltar sems can gyi don mdzad
T02D1912:137b-8: ma thag tu slar byon nas dkyil 'khor gyi shar
T02D1912:137b-9: lho mtshams kyi nang gi re'u'i cha zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1912:137b-10: 'khor gyi steng du gtso bo la chags pa'i tshul
T02D1912:137b-11: gyis blta zhing bzhugs par bsgom pa'i don to //
T02D1912:137b-13: gsang sngags las ni grub pa yi //
T02D1912:137b-14: gos dkar mo ni bskyed par bya //
T02D1912:137b-15: zhes bya ba ni sngags 'dis bskul zhing yi ge
T02D1912:137b-16: pam las lha mo gos dkar mo gong ma bzhin
T02D1912:137b-17: du bskyed pa'o // zhal mdzes spyan ni ring ba ste //
T02D1912:137b-18: zhes pa ni ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pas
T02D1912:137b-19: lha dang mi las 'phags par mdzes shing yid du
T02D1912:137b-20: 'ong ba'o // padma r'a ga'i mdog 'dra ba ni sku mdog shin tu dmar ba'o //
T02D1912:137b-21: zhal gsum dag ni bzhad pa'i zhal //
T02D1912:137b-22: zhes pa ni lha mo de yang zhal gsum dang
T02D1912:137b-23: ldan la sems can don la shin tu yang dga'
T02D1912:137b-24: ba 'am 'dod chags slong ba'i rang bzhin yin pas
T02D1912:137b-25: rtag tu bzhad tshul du gnas pa'o //

T02D1912:141a-1: pa gnyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer
T02D1912:141a-2: du zhugs pa'i sgo stong pa nyid la sogs pa
T02D1912:141a-3: bzhi la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bar

T02D1912:150a-32: // de las sprul pa'i sku sna tshogs su gyur
