T02D1912:150a-34: // pa'o // gal te mgon pos bdag srog bzhed pa na //
T02D1912:150a-35: yon tan rin chen gter ma bdag la spyod //
T02D1912:150a-36: ces pa ni de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan
T02D1912:150a-37: pa khyod bdag yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
T02D1912:150a-38: che dang 'dra ba'i sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad
T02D1912:150a-39: kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa la dgyes par spyod
T02D1912:150a-41: de ltar lha mos bskul nas ni //
T02D1912:150a-42: zhes pa ni de lta bu'i tshul dus sangs rgyas
T02D1912:150b-0: spyad la sogs pa'i lha @150b mo bzhis so so'i
T02D1912:150b-1: rigs kyi bdag po la bskul ma thag so so'i
T02D1912:150b-2: thigs kyi gtso bo dang gnyis su med par gyur
T02D1912:150b-3: nas thabs dang shes rab kyi rol pa'i byang chub
T02D1912:150b-4: sems las sems can 'dul ba'i thabs sna tshogs pa
T02D1912:150b-5: dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs
T02D1912:150b-6: su sbrul zhing phyogs bcur spros nas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1912:150b-7: pa rnams dgyes par byas pa dang sems can gyi
T02D1912:150b-8: don thams cad rdzogs par byas nas slar so so'i
T02D1912:150b-9: thugs kar tha mi dad par bsam mo //
T02D1912:150b-10: de nas yang so so'i thabs dang shes rab kyi
T02D1912:150b-11: rol pa byas pas byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od
T02D1912:150b-12: 'phros pas so so'i rigs kyi lha rnams la phog
T02D1912:150b-13: ma thag tu 'od de nyid kyi rang bzhin du
T02D1912:150b-14: gyur nas slar gong ma bzhin du gtso bo'i thugs
T02D1912:150b-15: kar thim mo // de nas yang thabs dang shes
T02D1912:150b-16: rab kyi rol pa mdzad pas gtso bo nyid bde
T02D1912:150b-17: ba chen po'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi sems su
T02D1912:150b-18: gyur nas yum gyi bha ga la thim nas gnyis
T02D1912:150b-19: su med par gyur par bsam mo //
T02D1912:150b-20: de nas rigs bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1912:150b-22: khro bo dang khro mo rnams yum bzhi la thim
T02D1912:150b-23: pa'i yum bzhis dbus kyi gtso bo la so so'i
T02D1912:150b-24: rigs kyi bdag po'i sgo nas bstod cing bskul bas
T02D1912:150b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa byes ces pa'o
T02D1912:150b-26: // mi bskyod ye shes rdo rje che //
T02D1912:150b-27: zhes pa'i tshig su bcad pa gcig gis ni lha
T02D1912:150b-28: mo m'a ma k'i sa chog kyi dbyings kyi ye
T02D1912:150b-29: shes kyi sgo nas bstod pa'o //
T02D1912:150b-30: bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje mi
T02D1912:150b-31: bskyod pa'i phyag rgyar gnas pa de la nyon mongs
T02D1912:150b-32: pa dang drag byed la sogs pa'i bdud rnams kyis
T02D1912:150b-33: bskyod cing g-yo bar mi nus bas mi bskyod pa'o
T02D1912:150b-34: // ye shes ni chos kyi skur ston pa'o //
T02D1912:150b-35: rdo rje dbyings kyi chos yis kyi sku de yang
T02D1912:150b-36: nam mkha' ltar chad pa ma yin zhing kun rdzob
T02D1912:150b-37: tu sems can gyi don du sna tshogs su 'byung
T02D1912:150b-38: bas so // blo chen po ni de ltar bur
T02D1912:150b-39: snang ba rnams sems can thams cad bla na med
T02D1912:150b-40: pa'i byang chub tu dgos pa'i thabs dang ldan pa'i
T02D1912:150b-41: bas so // don to // rdo rje gsum mchog
T02D1912:150b-42: ni dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs kyi
T02D1912:150b-43: bas so // don to // rang bzhin no //
T02D1912:150b-44: dkyil 'khor gsum ni de nyid las rigs gsum du
T02D1912:150b-45: bas so // don to // rang bzhin no //
T02D1912:150b-46: ston pa'o // de lta bu'i de 'jig rten pa
T02D1912:151a-1: shing spyod pa'i yul ma yin pa dang /
T02D1912:151a-2: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams la bstan du mi rung bas gsang ba'i dbyings su //
T02D1912:151a-3: de lta bu de nyid la lus ngag yid gsum
T02D1912:151a-4: gyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal na bsod nams thob par
T02D1912:151a-5: 'gyur bas phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas tshul 'di
T02D1912:151a-6: bzhin du bstod cing phyag 'tshal bar ston pa'o //
T02D1912:151a-7: rnam par snang mdzad dga' chen po //
T02D1912:151a-8: zhes pa la sogs pas ni lha mo sangs rgyas
T02D1912:151a-9: spyan gyis rang gi gtso bo la me long lta
T02D1912:151a-10: bu'i ye shes kyi sgo nas bstod cing bskul ba'o
T02D1912:151a-11: // de la rnam par snang mdzad ni sku las
T02D1912:151a-12: 'od sna tshogs 'phros shing 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
T02D1912:151a-13: mun pa sel shing snang bar mdzad pa dang /
T02D1912:151a-14: gdul bya'i sems can gyi mos pa'i sgo nas sku
T02D1912:151a-15: sna tshogs su sprul zhing snang bar mdzad nas de
T02D1912:151a-16: rnams kyi gti mug gi mun pa bsal nas ye
T02D1912:151a-17: shes kyi snang bskyed pa'i don to //
T02D1912:151a-18: yang na thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo nas sems
T02D1912:151a-19: can rnams la bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gsal
T02D1912:151a-21: dga' chen po ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon
T02D1912:151a-22: mongs pa nyan thos lta bur rim gyis spong ba
T02D1912:151a-23: ma yin te ye nas mi mnga' ba'i don to
T02D1912:151a-24: // de'i phyir na rdo rje zhi ba'o //
T02D1912:151a-25: dgyes pa che zhing ni de lta bu'i don gyis rtag tu mi mthun pa mi mnga' ba dang /
T02D1912:151a-26: lha mo bzhi dang gnyis su med pa'i thabs dang
T02D1912:151a-27: shes rab kyi rol pa rtag tu mdzad cing bde
T02D1912:151a-28: ba chen po nyams su myong ba'i rang bzhin la
T02D1912:151a-30: de lta bu'i tshul du lhun gyis grub pas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o /
T02D1912:151a-32: de lta bu'i bdag nyid kyi rang bzhin ni rdo rje'o //
T02D1912:151a-33: de nyid gzhan la bstan zhing thob par mdzad pas rdo rje ston pa'o //
T02D1912:151a-34: de lta bu la phyag 'tshal bar bya zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:151a-35: rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab //
T02D1912:151a-36: ces pa la sogs pas ni mnyam pa nyid kyi
T02D1912:151a-37: sgo nas rin po che'i rigs la lha mo ratna
T02D1912:151a-39: de la rin chen rgyal po bcom ldan 'das ma
T02D1912:151a-40: de nyid rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgyar gnas
T02D1912:151a-41: shing sems can thams cad kyi re ba bskang ba'i
T02D1912:151a-42: phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rang
T02D1912:151a-43: bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes las grub pa'i
T02D1912:151b-0: yid bzhin @151b gyi rin po che phyag tu bsnams
T02D1912:151b-1: pa'am / yang na bdag nyid rin po che de lta bu'i rang bzhin yin pa'o //
T02D1912:151b-2: bdud bzhi las rgyal zhing khams gsum gyi dri mas ma gos pa'i phyir rgyal po'o //
T02D1912:151b-3: de nyid kyi tshul mthar thug pa med pas shin tu zab pa'o //
T02D1912:151b-4: de lta bu'i phyag rgya ston cing sems can gyi
T02D1912:151b-5: don sna tshogs mdzad kyang de nyid la mi chags
T02D1912:151b-7: de lta bu yin yang don dam par dmigs pa med pa'i tshul yin pas nam mkha' rdo rje'o //
T02D1912:151b-9: rang bzhin dgag pas gos pa med //
T02D1912:151b-11: de lta bu de'i gsung yang gzhan du mi 'gyur bas /
T02D1912:151b-12: dag pa'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo /
T02D1912:151b-14: rgyal chen rdo rje snang mtha' yas //
T02D1912:151b-15: zhes pa la sogs pas ni so sor rtog pa'i
T02D1912:151b-16: ye shes kyi sgo nas lha mo panda ra ba
T02D1912:151b-17: sis padma rigs la bstod pa'o /
T02D1912:151b-18: sku las 'od zer 'phros pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1912:151b-19: kun rdzob tu phyag rgyar bstan zhing 'dod chags dang
T02D1912:151b-20: du len cing spyod pa'i sgo nas sems can gyi
T02D1912:151b-21: don mdzad kyang de'i nyes pa rnams kyis mi gos
T02D1912:151b-22: pas pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D1912:151b-24: rnam par mi rtog rdo rje mkha' //
T02D1912:151b-26: de lta bu de dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1912:151b-27: gsung gi rang bzhin yin pas rdo rje gsung ngo
T02D1912:151b-28: // rdo rje don grub yang dag shes //
T02D1912:151b-29: zhes pa la sogs pas ni lha mo ta ras
T02D1912:151b-30: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyi sgo nas
T02D1912:151b-31: bstod pa'o // de la rdo rje don grub ni
T02D1912:151b-32: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las kyi rang bzhin
T02D1912:151b-33: gyi phyag rgyar gnas nas sems can gyi don kun
T02D1912:151b-35: de yang 'khrul pa dang mu cor med pa yin
T02D1912:151b-36: zhing mos pa dang mthun pa'i sgo nas don mdzad
T02D1912:151b-39: bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad //
T02D1912:151b-41: de yang 'khor ba pa bzhin du las kyis skyes
T02D1912:151b-42: pa ma yin zhing chos kyi sku las snang par
T02D1912:151b-43: gyur pas rang bzhin dag pa nyid las byung zhes
T02D1912:151b-44: bya // de dag thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D1912:151b-45: nyid yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
T02D1912:151b-47: de ltar bstod tshig zhi ba yis //
T02D1912:151b-48: sangs rgyas thams cad bstod byas shing //
T02D1912:151b-49: rdo rje longs spyod kyis bskul na //
T02D1912:152a-2: zhes pa ni de ltar lha mo rnams kyis rigs
T02D1912:152a-3: lnga'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das zhe sdang rdo rje
T02D1912:152a-4: la bstod cing bskul ba'i tshigs bcad rnams kyi phan
T02D1912:152a-5: yon bstan te / de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1912:152a-6: phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyang lha mo
T02D1912:152a-7: rnams kyis ji ltar bstod cing bskul ba bzhin du
T02D1912:152a-8: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D1912:152a-9: gshegs pa rnams la thabs dang shes rab kyi sgo
T02D1912:152a-10: nas bstod cing bskul na sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes
T02D1912:152a-11: shing dgyes par gyur nas de la dngos grub stsol
T02D1912:152a-12: ba'i phyir ro // yang na dam tshig bsrung ba'i
T02D1912:152a-13: mchog de nyid yin pas bsod nams dang ye shes
T02D1912:152a-14: kyi tshogs rdzogs par gyur pa'i don to //
T02D1912:152a-15: lha mos de bzhin gshegs bstod pa //
T02D1912:152a-16: rdo rje blo yis gzigs nas ni //
T02D1912:152a-17: sku gsung thugs la bsdus nas kyang //
T02D1912:152a-18: sna tshogs rjes su chags par mdzad //
T02D1912:152a-19: ces bya ba ni de ltar lha mo rnams kyis
T02D1912:152a-20: bstod cing bskul bas zhe sdang rdo rjes dgongs pa'i
T02D1912:152a-21: tshul du 'dzum pa mdzad nas nyid kyi sku gsung
T02D1912:152a-22: thugs dang de rnams kyi sku gsung thugs gnyis su
T02D1912:152a-24: de la skabs 'dir sku ni rdo rje dang padma'o //
T02D1912:152a-26: thugs ni snying ga sprad cing dam por 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1912:152a-27: sna tshogs rjes su chags par mdzad pa ni de
T02D1912:152a-28: ltar gyur nas ka ma la sh'i gham las 'byung
T02D1912:152a-29: ba'i tshul du so so chags par mdzad cing bde
T02D1912:152a-30: ba chen po nyams su blangs shing sems can gyi
T02D1912:152a-31: don mdzad nas / yang thabs dang shes rab kyi
T02D1912:152a-32: rol pa byas nas byang chub kyi sems phab ma
T02D1912:152a-33: thag tu lha mo rnams 'od kyi tshul du gyur
T02D1912:152a-34: nas nyid kyi sku gsung thugs la thim zhing gnyis
T02D1912:152a-35: su med par gyur par bsgom par bya ba'i don
T02D1912:152a-36: don mdzad nas / to // dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong ba ni //
T02D1912:152a-37: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02D1912:152a-38: zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgom pa'am /
T02D1912:152a-39: gzugs brnyan du bkod pa rnams de ltar nyid kyi
T02D1912:152a-40: sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du bsdu bar byas
T02D1912:152a-42: cho ga ni gong du bsdus pa'i tshul bstan pa nyid do //
T02D1912:152a-43: de ltar bsdus nas kyang ci byed ce na /
T02D1912:152a-44: bzlas pa dag kyang bsdu bar bya //
T02D1912:152a-46: de ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus nas thugs ka
T02D1912:152b-0: na gnas pa'i h'um las 'od zer 'phros shing @152b
T02D1912:152b-1: bar snang khyab par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la
T02D1912:152b-2: phog pas de rnams kyang 'od kyi tshul du gyur
T02D1912:152b-3: nas slar bdag la thim par bsam mo //
T02D1912:152b-4: de nas yang 'od zer 'phros pas bdag phyag rgyar
T02D1912:152b-5: gnas pa'i sku la phog pas 'od du gyur nas
T02D1912:152b-6: thugs ka na gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' la
T02D1912:152b-7: thim mo // de nas yang h'um las 'od zer
T02D1912:152b-8: 'phros pas ye shes sems dpa' la phog pas de
T02D1912:152b-9: yang 'od kyi tshul du h'um la thim mo //
T02D1912:152b-10: de nas yang 'od 'phros pas h'um yang 'od du gyur to //
T02D1912:152b-11: 'od kyang phyogs bcur 'phros pas nam mkha' dang gnyis
T02D1912:152b-12: su med par gyur nas chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin
T02D1912:152b-14: de ltar gnas pa yang ci nus su gnas nas
T02D1912:152b-15: ldang zhing 'gro bar 'dod na spyi bo dang lce
T02D1912:152b-16: steng dang snying gar sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon
T02D1912:152b-17: yi ge gsum dmigs nas sngags gsum gyis byin gyis
T02D1912:152b-18: brlabs la ci bde bar gnas par bya ba'i don
T02D1912:152b-19: no // ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa na //
T02D1912:152b-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnal 'byor pas
T02D1912:152b-21: dus yun ring por sgom zhing sgrub pa'i tshe lus
T02D1912:152b-22: nyam chung bar gyur na thabs 'dis gzi byin bskyed
T02D1912:152b-23: cing brtan par bya ba bstan to //
T02D1912:152b-24: de la ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1912:152b-25: bdag gi spyi bo'i steng bar snang la mtho gong
T02D1912:152b-26: gi tshad tsam du yi ge aa las zla ba'i
T02D1912:152b-27: dkyil 'khor bskyed la de'i steng du dus gsum gyi
T02D1912:152b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi
T02D1912:152b-29: rang bzhin yi ge aom bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1912:152b-30: de las 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
T02D1912:152b-31: gyi khams kyi bcud rnams bkug nas aom de nyid
T02D1912:152b-33: de nas yang aom de bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du
T02D1912:152b-34: gnas pa'i bcud rnams 'od kyi tshul du zla ba'i
T02D1912:152b-36: de dang zla ba'i bdud rtsi gnyis gcig tu byung
T02D1912:152b-37: nas zla ba las bdag gi spyi bor thigs pa
T02D1912:152b-38: 'od zer gyi tshul du thim zhing lus kun du
T02D1912:152b-40: bdud rtsi rnams ni 'byung bar bsam //
T02D1912:152b-42: rdo rje sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T02D1912:152b-43: skad cig du yang mdangs ldan 'gyur //
T02D1912:152b-44: lus dang ngag sems bde bar gnas //
T02D1912:153a-2: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bsgoms pa'i phan yon
T02D1912:153a-3: bstan te ye shes kyi sbyor ba nge bstan pa
T02D1912:153a-4: bzhin du ma nor bar bsgoms na gza' byin skye
T02D1912:153a-6: bkres skom la sogs sdug bsngal la //
T02D1912:153a-7: sbyor ba 'di ni rnam par bsam //
T02D1912:153a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnal 'byor pa bkres
T02D1912:153a-9: skom la sogs pa byung zhing yo byad la sogs
T02D1912:153a-10: pa med na ting nge 'dzin spong zhing tshol du
T02D1912:153a-11: mi 'gro ste / 'og nas 'byung ba'i cho ga bya zhes pa'i don te /
T02D1912:153a-12: de byas na bkres ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsal thams cad med par 'gyur bar nges pa'i phyir //
T02D1912:153a-13: mi gtsang rdo rje tshig bzhin te //
T02D1912:153a-15: mi gtsang rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
T02D1912:153a-16: de'i gsung gzhan du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1912:153a-17: de yang ji ltar bya zhe na /
T02D1912:153a-18: bdag lha gang bsgom yang rung ste bkres pa la
T02D1912:153a-19: sogs pa byung na de ma thag tu bcom ldan
T02D1912:153a-20: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgyar bsgoms la
T02D1912:153a-21: / kha'i yar rkan la he las 'dod 'jo'i ba kha dog dkar mo gcig bsam //
T02D1912:153a-22: lce'i steng du aom dkar po gcig dmigs la de'i
T02D1912:153a-23: mtha' yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches bskor
T02D1912:153a-24: bar bsgoms pa'i rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po
T02D1912:153a-25: zhes pa la sogs pa smos so //
T02D1912:153a-26: sdug bsngal kun sel zhi ba ni //
T02D1912:153a-27: ye shes rdo rjes byin brlabs te /
T02D1912:153a-28: zhes pa ni de ltar bsgoms nas ye shes las
T02D1912:153a-29: gyur pa'i ba dang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin
T02D1912:153a-30: po che las yid la 'dod pa'i zas la sogs
T02D1912:153a-31: ba rnams lce'i steng du byung zhing lus kun du
T02D1912:153a-33: sdug bsngal thams cad de'i byin rlabs kyis med par 'gyur ba'i don to //
T02D1912:153a-34: gang zhig 'di ni sgom byed pa //
T02D1912:153a-35: byang chub sems dpa' grags chen 'gyur //
T02D1912:153a-36: zhes pa ni bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs de
T02D1912:153a-37: yan chad du bshang pa bzhin bsgoms shing bsgrubs pa'i
T02D1912:153a-39: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
T02D1912:153a-40: tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur bas
T02D1912:153a-41: de ma thob pa'i bar du byang chub sems dpa'i
T02D1912:153a-42: grangs su chud pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1912:153b-0: de yang sgom zhing sgrub pa'i dus @153b thams cad
T02D1912:153b-1: du byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang 'bral
T02D1912:153b-3: byang chub sems dang sbyor ldan na //
T02D1912:153b-4: sku sogs dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D1912:153b-6: dad pa med dang theg dman zhugs //
T02D1912:153b-7: zhes pa la sogs pas ni gsang sngags ma h'a
T02D1912:153b-8: yo ga'i snying po rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
T02D1912:153b-10: de yang de'i don gyi snying po bsdus pa 'di
T02D1912:153b-11: yin pas kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas shin
T02D1912:153b-12: tu yang gsang bar bya zhes bstan to //
T02D1912:153b-13: de la dad pa med pa ni yid mi ches pa dang tshul bzhin du mi sgrub pa'o //
T02D1912:153b-14: theg dman zhugs pa ni yo ga man chad dang du len cing spyod pa rnams so //
T02D1912:153b-15: 'dod chags zhe sdang ni 'dod chags shin tu che
T02D1912:153b-16: ba dang zhe sdang shin tu che ba rnams so
T02D1912:153b-17: // dbang po rtul pa ni de lta bu'i skyon
T02D1912:153b-18: med kyang shes rab chung ba'i dbang gis bstan kyang
T02D1912:153b-20: slob dang bu la sbyin mi bya //
T02D1912:153b-21: zhes pa ni dad pa med pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1912:153b-22: skyon yod pa'i skyes bu bdag gi bu yang rung
T02D1912:153b-23: chos 'di ma rtogs pa'i sgo nas slob bur gyur
T02D1912:153b-24: cing zhes pa la sogs kyang bstan par mi bya
T02D1912:153b-26: gang phyir sgrub pa 'di brtsams pa //
T02D1912:153b-27: zhes pa la sogs pa ni phyi rabs kyi rnal
T02D1912:153b-28: 'byor pa rnams kyis yid mi ches shing skur ba
T02D1912:153b-29: 'debs par dgongs nas rgyud kyi khungs la sogs pa
T02D1912:153b-31: gang phyir sgrub pa 'di brtsams pa //
T02D1912:153b-32: zhes pa ni slob dpon gyis sgrub pa'i thabs 'di brtsam pa 'di don med pa ma yin te /
T02D1912:153b-33: rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub phyir zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02D1912:153b-34: de la bab col ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
T02D1912:153b-35: rgyud don mngon par rtogs nas ni //
T02D1912:153b-37: de yang rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba 'dus pa bdag gi slob dpon gyis bstan pa dang /
T02D1912:153b-38: rang gi shes rab kyis ma nor bar shes pa'i don to //
T02D1912:153b-39: rdo rje bzhad pa'i slob dpon gyis //
T02D1912:153b-40: zhes pa ni nyid kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T02D1912:153b-41: nyid la nyid slob dpon zhes gsungs pa ni yul
T02D1912:153b-42: thams cad du slob dpon du grags pa dang mkhas
T02D1912:153b-43: par zhal gyis 'ches ba'i don to //
T02D1912:153b-44: slob dpon gyis ci'i phyir mdzad ce na /
T02D1912:154a-3: de yang gong du rdo rje sems dpa' sgrub phyir
T02D1912:154a-4: zhes bstan na 'dir de skad ci'i phyir bstan zhe
T02D1912:154a-5: na / rdo rje sems dpa' tshe 'di nyid la
T02D1912:154a-6: ma grub na yang 'di shes shing thos par gyur
T02D1912:154a-7: na rgyud gsang ba 'dus pa shes bar 'gyur la
T02D1912:154a-8: na / / de shes pas gsang sngags rnams la
T02D1912:154a-9: mkhas par 'gyur ba dang tha snyad thams cad la
T02D1912:154a-11: dpal bde ba chen po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
T02D1912:154a-13: dpal bde ba chen po'i sgo nas bde ba chen
T02D1912:154a-14: po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' mngon sum du 'gyur
T02D1912:154a-15: ba'i thabs sam de nyid kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur
T02D1912:154a-16: ba'i thabs so // rdzogs pa ni nyid kyi dgongs pa ma lus pa'o //
T02D1912:154a-17: sgrub thabs rnam par bshad pa 'di /
T02D1912:154a-18: bdag gis byas ba'i dge ba yis //
T02D1912:154a-20: don ni rnam par rtogs bar shog //
